issues.title: Spring Metrics Configuration fails with Spring Boot 4
issues.author: jrogers
issues.summary: Spring Boot 4 metrics configuration fails because the MetricsScopeAutoConfiguration waits for CompositeMeterRegistryAutoConfiguration, but the class package location changed in Spring Boot 4, causing metrics to be emitted to a no-op scope instead of the actual Micrometer MeterRegistry.

issues.title: Support using Temporal failures in Nexus APIs
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to support using Temporal failures in Nexus APIs, enabling better error handling and integration between Nexus operations and Temporal's failure model.

issues.title: Environment Configuration does not read the correct file path on macOS
issues.author: pvsone
issues.summary: Java SDK reads incorrect configuration file path on macOS, using Linux path (~/.config/temporalio/temporal.toml) instead of the documented macOS path ($HOME/Library/Application Support/temporal/temporal.toml). This prevents users from loading profiles created with the CLI.

issues.title: Unexpected Activity Timeout Behavior After Worker Crash & Need for CancellationScope Status Check
issues.author: 40lsgy1
issues.summary: User reports that activities don't retry after worker crashes during execution if the StartToCloseTimeout is exceeded, and requests a way to check CancellationScope cancellation status after scope exit.

issues.title: OpenTracingWorkflowClientCallsInterceptor - support for updateWithStart is not present
issues.author: deepika-awasthi
issues.summary: OpenTracingWorkflowClientCallsInterceptor is missing support for the updateWithStart operation, preventing trace propagation for this workflow update pattern. The trace header remains empty for the workflow execution started event when using updateWithStart.

issues.title: Tests not passing: TestStatsReporter Flush not flushing
issues.author: TbirdDuncan
issues.summary: Tests in WorkflowFailedMetricsTests are failing intermittently when run in conjunction with other tests because the TestStatsReporter.flush() method in the @Before setup is not properly clearing metrics from previous test executions, causing assertion failures for expected metrics.

issues.title: @WorkflowImpl(workers = "...") should support Spring property placeholders like taskQueues does
issues.author: karunagoyal
issues.summary: The @WorkflowImpl annotation's workers attribute does not support Spring property placeholders like ${my.property}, while taskQueues does. This inconsistency breaks placeholder-based configuration sharing across multiple services with different worker names.

issues.title: Jackson 3 support
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for Jackson 3, the next major version of the JSON serialization library used by the Java SDK. This requires creating a new Jackson 3 JSON data converter while maintaining backward compatibility with Jackson 2, given that Jackson 3 requires Java 17 minimum.

issues.title: WorkerOptions isUsingVirtualThreadsOnWorkflowWorker issue
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: WorkerOptions.isUsingVirtualThreadsOnWorkflowWorker() is incorrectly returning the value of usingVirtualThreadsOnActivityWorker instead of its own value, indicating a copy-paste bug in the getter method.

issues.title: Support non-workflow activities
issues.author: maciejdudko
issues.summary: Allow executing activities outside of workflow context. This requires client support for new server APIs to start, manage, and retrieve activity results, plus worker support for running activities independently.

issues.title: Spring Boot 4 Support
issues.author: anatoliy-pylypchuk-kg
issues.summary: Request for Temporal SDK support for Spring Boot 4, which was released in November 2025. Spring Boot 4's modularization may require SDK changes, and Jackson 3 support will also be needed since Jackson 2 is deprecated in Spring Boot 4.

issues.title: Returning custom RuntimeException from FailureConverter leads to stuck workflows
issues.author: djivko
issues.summary: User's custom FailureConverter returns a RuntimeException that causes workflows to hang in an infinite loop during failure deserialization. The issue occurs when the converter returns a custom RuntimeException instead of TemporalFailure, despite this being supported after SDK 1.28.

issues.title: Non-root namespaces should be able to use the in-memory test server
issues.author: billrich2001
issues.summary: Non-root namespaces cannot use the in-memory test server in Spring Boot autoconfiguration due to a bean name/type mismatch. The code looks for a TestWorkflowEnvironmentAdapter with an incorrect bean name, causing non-root namespaces to connect to the dev server instead.

issues.title: activity_schedule_to_start_latency reports activity_type unexpectedly
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: activity_schedule_to_start_latency metric incorrectly reports activity_type dimension, including unexpected 'none' values when activities fail and are retried. The metric should either consistently report activity_type for all activities or not report it at all.

issues.title: Set GrpcMessageTooLarge as failure_reason for workflow task failed metric
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add GrpcMessageTooLarge as a failure_reason for workflow task failed metric in the Java SDK to better track and diagnose gRPC message size limit violations.

issues.title: INTERNAL: Panic! This is a bug! in wrapStartException
issues.author: FelixSanthanasekar
issues.summary: User reported an internal panic error ("Panic! This is a bug!") when starting a workflow in Java SDK v1.23.0. The issue was closed as stale when the user did not respond to a request to reproduce on the latest version.

issues.title: ScheduleRange to check end
issues.author: eye-dee
issues.summary: ScheduleRange constructor has a duplicate validation check for the step parameter instead of checking the end parameter. The code checks step twice when it should validate that end is within valid bounds.

issues.title: Allow overriding of the Worker Deployment Version when invoking a Child Workflow
issues.author: chris-olszewski
issues.summary: Allow users to override the Worker Deployment Version when invoking a Child Workflow, similar to how it works when creating a Workflow from a client. This is needed for pre-deployment testing scenarios.

issues.title: Allow Configuration Option to Enable Spring Application Startup Even When Temporal is Unavailable
issues.author: ccrouse-atlassian
issues.summary: Request to add a Spring Boot configuration option allowing applications to start even when Temporal server is unavailable. Currently the application fails to start if it cannot connect to Temporal, but for some applications Temporal is not a hard dependency.

issues.title: Worker Heartbeating
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Implement worker heartbeating in Java SDK through a new background nexus worker, based on the design from Rust SDK core.

issues.title: Improper file path for envconfig
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The file path in the envconfig ClientConfig.java needs to be changed to use 'temporalio' as the directory instead of the current incorrect path.

issues.title: duplicated error message "invalid interval:..."  in RPCRetryOptions
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: RPCRetryOptions class duplicates error messages for multiple properties, making it hard to identify which property is misconfigured. Request to update error messages to be unique for each property.

issues.title: Default task failure cause to "workflow worker unhandled failure"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Java SDK defaults task failure cause to WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_UNSPECIFIED instead of WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_WORKFLOW_WORKER_UNHANDLED_FAILURE like Go SDK does. This should be changed to match Go SDK behavior for consistency, especially for user exceptions.

issues.title: [java] Plugin + SimplePlugin
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Implement a plugin system for the Java SDK to enable users to self-serve creating integrations with Temporal Workflows, following the pattern already established in the Python SDK.

issues.title: Add support for static summary for side effects and mutable side effects
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Side effect markers in the UI lack identifiable information, making it difficult to distinguish between multiple side effects in quick succession. The request is to add static summary support for side effects and mutable side effects, similar to how activities and local activities display summaries.

issues.title: Use normal task queue name for sticky task queue client metrics
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Port metrics improvement from sdk-core to Java SDK where sticky task queue client metrics should use the normal task queue name instead of a separate identifier for consistency and clarity.

issues.title: How to Register a Custom ContextPropagator for Multiple Temporal Namespaces in Spring Boot
issues.author: sivakumarpalakurthi
issues.summary: User needs guidance on registering a custom ContextPropagator across multiple Temporal namespaces in a Spring Boot application. Currently works for a single namespace but unclear how to apply it to multiple namespaces configured via application.yaml.

issues.title: Spring Boot application startup failure - DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
issues.author: brempusz
issues.summary: Spring Boot application fails to start when Temporal server is unreachable or under heavy load, throwing DEADLINE_EXCEEDED error during worker initialization. User expects graceful degradation with health check reporting instead of blocking startup.

issues.title: WorkflowIdReusePolicy.WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_REJECT_DUPLICATE does not throw WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted
issues.author: denvernyaw
issues.summary: User reported that WorkflowIdReusePolicy.WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_REJECT_DUPLICATE does not throw WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted when executing a workflow with a duplicate ID, but the issue was clarified as expected behavior: the SDK attaches to existing workflows instead of throwing exceptions when using execute().

issues.title: temporal java sdk is using an older version of grpc-netty-shaded with vulnerabilities
issues.author: susie-oracle
issues.summary: Temporal Java SDK is using an older version of gRPC (grpc-netty-shaded 1.58.x) that contains known vulnerabilities. While the vulnerability (CVE-2025-55163) doesn't directly impact the SDK's client-only usage, users want guidance on upgrading to the latest gRPC version (1.75.0+) and understanding compatibility.

issues.title: TestEnvironment with external service - failing tests throws IllegalStateException errors
issues.author: gauravthadani
issues.summary: TestWorkflowExtension throws an IllegalStateException when using external service mode and tests fail, because getDiagnostics is called on the external service which doesn't support it.

issues.title: Tracing - Native OpenTelemetry Interceptors
issues.author: AndresBena19
issues.summary: Request for native OpenTelemetry interceptors in the Java SDK to replace the deprecated OpenTracing-based integration. The current approach using OpenTelemetry shims with OpenTracing has limitations with baggage propagation and is not recommended by OpenTelemetry documentation.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment#sleep hangs indefinitely
issues.author: rpost
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment#sleep hangs indefinitely during test execution due to a deadlock between the main thread and workflow threads when calling unlockTimeSkippingWithSleep on the test server.

issues.title: Test server needs to set metadata `type` for search attribute payloads
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Test server should automatically set metadata `type` on search attribute payloads, matching the behavior of the production Temporal server.

issues.title: Serialization with `kotlinx.serialization`
issues.author: martin-ncs
issues.summary: User requests support for kotlinx.serialization in the Java SDK's PayloadConverter interface. The issue is that kotlinx.serialization requires compile-time type information (reified generics) that the current interface cannot provide, making it impossible to create a custom adapter while avoiding silent serialization errors.

issues.title: Set history size and suggest continue as new on task start attributes in test server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The test server should populate `suggest_continue_as_new` and `history_size_bytes` fields in WorkflowTaskStartedEventAttributes to better match production server behavior and enable more comprehensive testing.

issues.title: temporal-testing for Java does not propagate headers for signals in interceptors
issues.author: ivanasen
issues.summary: The temporal-testing library does not propagate headers for signals through interceptors, unlike the production Temporal server environment. When a WorkflowClientInterceptor sets headers on outgoing signals, these headers are null in the corresponding WorkflowInboundCallsInterceptor.handleSignal method during testing.

issues.title: Expose Temporal Nexus operation info to Temporal Nexus operation authors
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to expose Temporal Nexus operation info to operation authors, allowing them to access context about the operations they are implementing.

issues.title: Springboot Multi Namespace: Add annotation to specify Namespace a bean belongs too
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request for a Java annotation in Spring Boot to specify which namespace beans (interceptors/customizers) belong to in multi-namespace setups, providing a more idiomatic alternative to bean name prefixing.

issues.title: Testing server continue-as-new doesn't carry memo/search attributes
issues.author: jasonmchan
issues.summary: The testing server's continue-as-new implementation doesn't propagate memo and search attributes from the ContinueAsNewWorkflowExecutionCommandAttributes, unlike the production Temporal server which correctly carries these forward to the new workflow execution.

issues.title: UNKNOWN GRPC error on describe in TestWorkflowEnvironment
issues.author: jeffschoner-stripe
issues.summary: Intermittent UNKNOWN gRPC error occurs when calling describe on workflows in TestWorkflowEnvironment, caused by a NullPointerException when processing pending child execution info during workflow description.

issues.title: Add overload for `WorkflowStub.cancel` to target exact workflow execution
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to add an overload for WorkflowStub.cancel() that targets the exact workflow execution used to create the stub, rather than the latest workflow in the execution chain.

issues.title: Ensure tests exist to confirm custom slot supplier slot info has proper fields
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add tests to verify that custom slot supplier implementations properly populate all required slot info fields. Related to feature consistency validation across the Java SDK.

issues.title: Activity Type not registered error when using RetryOptions with maxAttempts(1)
issues.author: mmirzaeyan
issues.summary: User reported an error where activities appeared unregistered when using RetryOptions with maxAttempts(1), but investigation revealed the actual issue was multiple workers on the same task queue with different activities registered, not a bug with RetryOptions.

issues.title: `workflow_task_queue_poll_succeed` is not emitted when poller autoscaling is on
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The `workflow_task_queue_poll_succeed` metric is not being emitted when poller autoscaling is enabled in the Java SDK. This metric should be reported regardless of autoscaling configuration.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Reclassify Benign Application errors in OpenTelemetry
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Request to reclassify benign application errors in OpenTelemetry metrics to prevent them from appearing as error signals. This feature request is based on a similar Python SDK issue.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment sleep incorrect behaviour
issues.author: oleg-kovrizhin-paradym
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment.sleep() incorrectly uses real time instead of virtual time when executed after a test that uses child workflows, causing tests to hang unexpectedly. Virtual time works correctly when the test runs in isolation.

issues.title: Spring Boot: Allow multiple TemporalOptionsCustomizer per namespace ordered by Springboot convention
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Spring Boot starter non-standard bean resolution for TemporalOptionsCustomizer prevents multiple customizers per namespace and violates Spring conventions. Request to support ordered composition of customizers and namespace filtering.

issues.title: strange behaviour when registrating activities with worker in java sdk
issues.author: SvetlozarMihaylov
issues.summary: User encounters TypeAlreadyRegisteredException when registering multiple Activity implementations that inherit from a common interface with non-@ActivityMethod methods. The error occurs because the SDK treats the inherited method name as a duplicate activity type.

issues.title: Clarify nexus operation cancellation failure
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to clarify the behavior and error messaging when a nexus operation cancellation fails, to improve developer understanding of failure modes.

issues.title: Plugin support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add plugin support to the Java SDK, as outlined in the cross-repository features issue #652. This would enable extensibility through a plugin architecture.

issues.title: OpenTracingClientInterceptor add support for updateWithStart
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: OpenTracingClientInterceptor does not propagate traces for the updateWithStart operation, resulting in empty header fields for the first workflow execution started event.

issues.title: In a Nexus handler only pass a completion callback if a completion URL is provided
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Nexus handler incorrectly passes a completion callback even when no completion URL is provided, causing unnecessary or incorrect behavior.

issues.title: Align Nexus handler failure conversion with other SDKs
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Align the Nexus handler failure conversion logic in the Java SDK with the implementations in other Temporal SDKs to ensure consistent error handling behavior across all language implementations.

issues.title: Spring Boot Autoconfigure README link invalid
issues.author: C-Deck
issues.summary: The Spring Boot Autoconfigure README contains an invalid link in the Metrics section that redirects to an incorrect page. The team plans to move this documentation to the main docs.temporal.io site.

issues.title: Spring boot with namespaces configuration Connection refused: /127.0.0.1:7233 in tests
issues.author: oleg-kovrizhin-paradym
issues.summary: Spring Boot Temporal starter version 1.30.1 fails to start the test server when multiple namespaces are configured, resulting in connection refused errors on port 7233. The same configuration works in version 1.29.0.

issues.title: NonRootBeanPostProcessor causes meter-registry eager init
issues.author: bikeholik
issues.summary: NonRootBeanPostProcessor eagerly initializes meter-registry before customizers are applied, causing custom tags and other customizations to be missing from metrics. This was a Spring Boot integration issue that prevented MeterRegistryCustomizer beans from being properly applied.

issues.title: TestWorkflowMutableStateImpl - race condition between TimerFired event and CancelTimer command
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Race condition in TestWorkflowMutableStateImpl where a TIMER_FIRED event removes a timer in the same workflow task, causing a subsequent CancelTimer command to fail with an invalid_argument exception. This prevents the workflow from completing and making progress.

issues.title: ApplicationFailure.Builder requires Category be set
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: ApplicationFailure.Builder requires the Category field to be explicitly set, but this requirement is unexpected and creates friction for users creating application failures.

issues.title: Allow specifying activity options for specific activity call
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to allow overriding activity options (timeout, retry, etc.) on a per-call basis rather than being locked to the stub configuration. Currently requires creating a new stub for each different option set.

issues.title: Request: Support for Kotlin 2.0 and Newer Versions of gRPC, Netty, and Related Dependencies
issues.author: andelgdo
issues.summary: User requests support for Kotlin 2.0 and newer versions of gRPC (1.62+), Netty (4.1.102+), and related dependencies. Currently, the SDK supports older versions of these libraries.

issues.title: Request: Support for Kotlin 2.0 and Newer Versions of gRPC, Netty, and Related Dependencies
issues.author: andelgdo
issues.summary: User requests support for Kotlin 2.0 and newer versions of gRPC, Netty, and related JVM dependencies in the Temporal Java SDK. The maintainer clarified that the Java SDK already supports the latest gRPC versions and noted that while no official Kotlin SDK exists, many users successfully use the Java SDK from Kotlin.

issues.title: Created accidentally
issues.author: andelgdo
issues.summary: An issue created accidentally with no meaningful content or description.

issues.title: Python Nexus tests failing under Java test server
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: Python Nexus tests are failing when run against the Java test server, with gRPC errors indicating missing methods in generated message classes. The issue reproduces with time-skipping enabled and eventually times out.

issues.title: When parsing operation token, treat `null` as zero
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Fix null handling in operation token parsing to treat null values as zero instead of causing an error.

issues.title: Use operation token for the OPERATION_TOKEN header value
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The OPERATION_TOKEN header is currently using the workflow ID as its value, but it should use the operation token instead. This is a correctness fix for proper header value assignment.

issues.title: Time skipping server drops headers in workflow signal
issues.author: tconley1428
issues.summary: Headers set via client interceptor are not propagated to workflow signal handlers when using the time-skipping test server. The headers appear blank in the inbound workflow interceptor, breaking header-based functionality in signal processing.

issues.title: Null cause in Nexus HandlerException is not handled correctly
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: HandlerException constructor allows null cause, but the serialization code crashes when attempting to handle this case. The PayloadAndFailureDataConverter doesn't properly handle null causes in Nexus HandlerExceptions.

issues.title: Add Summary to LocalActivityOptions
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Request to add a summary field to LocalActivityOptions in the Java SDK. This feature aligns with the parent issue in the features repository and has already been implemented.

issues.title: Non-root namespace Spring dependencies fail on app startup
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Non-root namespace Spring dependencies fail during application startup because the BeanPostProcessor that creates these beans runs after bean initialization. This contradicts the documentation which claims this configuration is supported.

issues.title: `startUpdate` JavaDoc says "asynchronously" when it may not be
issues.author: rgrochowicz
issues.summary: JavaDoc for `startUpdate` incorrectly states it's always asynchronous, but when called with `waitForStage` set to `WorkflowUpdateStage.COMPLETED`, the method actually blocks until the update completes. The documentation needs to clarify this behavior.

issues.title: Support for ManualCompletion in TestActivity Env
issues.author: gauravthadani
issues.summary: User cannot test activities that use ManualActivityCompletionClient with TestActivityEnvironment. The feature request asks for either direct support for manual completion in the test environment or a way to mock the ManualActivityCompletionClient.

issues.title: Upgrade grpc version
issues.author: gregor-rayman
issues.summary: User reported that upgrading gRPC from 1.58.1 to 1.60.0 causes NoClassDefFoundError for AbstractManagedChannelImplBuilder, preventing use of Java SDK with modern gRPC versions in applications using other gRPC functionality.

issues.title: Bug: workers-auto-discovery in Spring Boot scans packages not in specified list
issues.author: kulikj01
issues.summary: Spring Boot auto-discovery for workers incorrectly registers workflows and activities from packages not specified in the configuration. When multiple namespaces are configured with different package lists, all packages are registered in all namespaces instead of respecting the specified package boundaries.

issues.title: Environment configuration
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Request to implement external client configuration for Java SDK, aligning with cross-SDK standardization efforts documented in the features repository and proposals.

issues.title: [java] Add `WorkflowTaskFailedCause` to `RespondQueryTaskCompletedRequest`
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add `WorkflowTaskFailedCause` to `RespondQueryTaskCompletedRequest` to provide the same failure cause information available for workflow task failures.

issues.title: Support fetching workflow id and workflow run id through ScheduleActionExecution
issues.author: madhav2302
issues.summary: User requests adding getWorkflowId() and getFirstExecutionRunId() methods to the ScheduleActionExecution interface to avoid casting when fetching active running workflows through schedule describe calls. The maintainer declined, arguing that ScheduleActionExecution is a variant type that may support non-workflow actions in the future, and casting is the appropriate pattern.

issues.title: Add poller autoscaling options for Spring
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add poller autoscaling options for Spring integration to support dynamic adjustment of worker pollers based on demand.

issues.title: deploymentOptions should be set on all poll requests, not just workflow polls
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Deployment options for versioning are currently only applied to workflow poll requests, but should be set on all types of poll requests in the Java SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request]  Add counter metric for unaccessed failed promises
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Request to add a counter metric for unaccessed failed promises in the Java SDK to help developers detect when they forget to wait on promises or handle promise failures.

issues.title: Support for Custom Client Identity on Schedule Trigger
issues.author: deepika-awasthi
issues.summary: Feature request to support custom client identity on schedule trigger to differentiate between automatic schedule-triggered workflows and manual triggers, enabling identification of who or what service initiated a manual workflow run.

issues.title: [SpringBoot] Add option to fail worker autodiscovery on TypeAlreadyRegisteredException on activities
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Request to add a configuration option in Spring Boot autoconfiguration to fail worker startup when duplicate activity type definitions are detected, rather than silently logging and continuing.

issues.title: NonRootNamespaceAutoConfiguration#nonRootBeanPostProcessor breaks MeterRegistry customizations
issues.author: rpost
issues.summary: NonRootNamespaceAutoConfiguration#nonRootBeanPostProcessor causes early initialization of MeterRegistry before Spring's MeterRegistryPostProcessor is ready, causing MeterRegistryCustomizer to be ignored and metrics filtering to fail.

issues.title: Expose StartWorkflowExecutionResponse fields to ExecuteWorkflow API
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to expose StartWorkflowExecutionResponse fields through the ExecuteWorkflow API to provide more detailed information about workflow execution initiation. This tracks a feature gap identified in the features repository.

issues.title: Workflow instance should be accessible in test environment for simple assertion
issues.author: madhav2302
issues.summary: User requests ability to access workflow instance state directly in test environments for assertions without needing to add query methods to production code. Currently workflow objects are inaccessible after registration.

issues.title: The version of grpc needs to be updated
issues.author: fatekingsama
issues.summary: gRPC version used by the Java SDK is outdated and causes NoClassDefFoundError at runtime due to removed internal classes. The SDK needs to update to a newer gRPC version to maintain compatibility with modern applications.

issues.title: Temporal versions 1.28.3 1.29.0 compatibility with Springboot spring-boot-starter-parent 3.3.11
issues.author: DanielASAndrews
issues.summary: Spring Boot 3.3.11 upgrade caused Temporal Java SDK to fail during bean initialization due to gRPC deadline exceeded timeout when fetching system info from Temporal cluster. The issue appeared after upgrading from Spring Boot 3.3.4 to address CVE-2025-22235.

issues.title: Remove license headers from files
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove license headers from all Java SDK files following the server's decision to eliminate this requirement, and remove any tooling that generates or enforces them.

issues.title: Support pluggable workflow caches
issues.author: ghaskins
issues.summary: Proposal to support pluggable workflow caches in the Java SDK to allow customizable eviction strategies beyond the current synchronous LRU algorithm. This addresses scenarios where high-volume workloads with abandoned workflows could benefit from alternatives like TTL-based or asynchronous eviction mechanisms.

issues.title: [Feature] Make Jackson serialization an optional and separate module
issues.author: rocketraman
issues.summary: User requests making Jackson serialization optional and separate from the core Java SDK to avoid transitive dependencies and version conflicts, especially when using alternative serialization libraries. The feature request proposes moving Jackson to a separate module using Java Service Provider Interface for runtime discovery.

issues.title: Test server not showing user metadata for workflow start in history
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Test server is not displaying user metadata (summary/details) for workflow start in the EVENT_TYPE_WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_STARTED history event. The issue also needs verification that child workflows properly propagate this metadata.

issues.title: NP in ScheduleDescription.getMemo (should check `memoPayload == null`, not `memo`)
issues.author: fmaylinch
issues.summary: NPE in ScheduleDescription.getMemo() due to incorrect null check. Line 116 checks `memo == null` instead of `memoPayload == null`, causing a NullPointerException when memoPayload is null.

issues.title: [java] SDK support for activity reset
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to add SDK support for activity reset functionality in Java SDK, aligned with the cross-SDK features initiative.

issues.title: Warn when the server-provided task start time is fairly different than time SDK begins processing the task
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to warn users when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task. This enhancement was declined as too niche.

issues.title: Merging ActivityOptions fails with UnsupportedOperationException when using immutable lists for context propagators
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: ActivityOptions merge fails with UnsupportedOperationException when using immutable lists for context propagators. The issue occurs when merging ActivityOptions from WorkflowImplementationOptions with ActivityOptions from activity stubs that both use immutable lists created with List.of().

issues.title: Show retry policy on activity info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: User requests to display the retry policy configuration on the activity info object, similar to feature request in the features repository. This would allow developers to inspect what retry policy is applied to an activity at runtime.

issues.title: Memo-s not present in listOpenWorkflowExecutions when running with temporal-testing
issues.author: rpost
issues.summary: Memo fields are not populated in listOpenWorkflowExecutions results when using temporal-testing, despite being set in the workflow. The same code correctly returns memos when using an external Temporal server.

issues.title: Apply application failure logging and metrics behaviour according to `ApplicationErrorCategory`
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Implement application failure logging and metrics behavior according to ApplicationErrorCategory specification. This involves applying standardized error categorization to logging and metrics collection for application failures in the Java SDK.

issues.title: NonRootBeanPostProcessor eagerly depends on MeterRegistry which can have undesirable side effects
issues.author: bruto1
issues.summary: NonRootBeanPostProcessor eagerly instantiates MeterRegistry before MeterRegistryPostProcessor can register, causing meter customizers and binders to fail. Spring's dependency injection order in Temporal 1.28.0+ creates a circular initialization issue where metrics exposure disappears and bean post-processors are applied out of order.

issues.title: Cancellation scopes and async procedures are canceled in non-deterministic order when workflow is canceled
issues.author: sajkol
issues.summary: When a workflow is canceled while executing activities and timers within cancellation scopes, the order in which pending operations are canceled is non-deterministic, causing NonDeterministicException during replay. The SDK iterates over a HashSet without deterministic ordering.

issues.title: [Java] Worker Versioning high level client
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Create a high-level client for control plane operations concerning worker deployments in the Java SDK, as a follow-up to issue #2458 on worker versioning.

issues.title: Spring boot starter behavior changes on app startup
issues.author: parinmaru2
issues.summary: Spring Boot starter behavior changed in v1.22.0+ to fail startup if Temporal server is unavailable, breaking existing deployments that relied on graceful degradation. Users request a configuration option to restore the older behavior where worker startup succeeds even when the server is unreachable.

issues.title: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when the activities are paused.
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when activities are paused to prevent unnecessary heartbeat messages during pause periods.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Utility to detect when deadlock detector triggers
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Users need a way to programmatically detect when the workflow deadlock detector has triggered so they can implement defensive logic to stop processing and prevent zombie threads or infinite loops.

issues.title: Test server can overwrite last heartbeat details when not on fail request
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Test server incorrectly overwrites last heartbeat details on activity failure even when heartbeat details are not set, causing issues for Core-based SDKs that expect this behavior to be conditional.

issues.title: Support New Worker Versioning API
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add annotations to Java workflows to support the new versioning APIs introduced in the Temporal SDK. This aligns Java with the Go SDK implementation and enables developers to use the new worker versioning features.

issues.title: Worfklow StartDelay not working with TestWorkflowEnvironment
issues.author: gauravthadani
issues.summary: Workflow StartDelay is not being respected when using TestWorkflowEnvironment, regardless of time skipping settings. When time skipping is disabled, no actual delay occurs before workflow starts, and when enabled, no timer is created.

issues.title: GenericWorkflowClient can prevent exit of JVM
issues.author: lverns
issues.summary: GenericWorkflowClient creates a non-daemon thread (asyncThrottlerExecutor) that prevents JVM shutdown. The thread is never terminated, blocking natural process exit unless System.exit() is called.

issues.title: SpringBoot - create ScheduleClient per namespace that has namespace pre-configured in its ScheduleClientOptions
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Spring Boot integration feature request to auto-configure ScheduleClient instances per namespace, similar to how WorkflowClient is injected, eliminating the need for manual namespace configuration.

issues.title: 1.28.1 release - springboot config - apiKeys
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: SpringBoot configuration documentation states that HTTPS is automatically enabled when an API key is specified, but testing shows that HTTPS is not enabled unless explicitly set with enable-https: true.

issues.title: Add summary to Nexus operation
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to add a summary field to Nexus operations in the Java SDK, aligning with feature specifications defined in the cross-repository features issue.

issues.title: Spring boot initialization should fail if activity names (per worker) are duplicated
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Spring Boot initialization should fail when duplicate activity names are registered on a worker, matching the behavior of normal workers. Currently, it only logs a warning instead of throwing an error.

issues.title: Expose static summary/details on workflow execution description
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add getStaticSummary() and getStaticDetails() methods to WorkflowExecutionDescription to expose static workflow metadata from the describe operation, separate from the base WorkflowExecutionMetadata class used by listExecutions.

issues.title: Expose root workflow execution
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose the root workflow execution in the Java SDK, allowing users to access context about the parent workflow execution when running in a child workflow context.

issues.title: Built-in query responses should use "RawValue"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Built-in query responses should be updated to use RawValue format once related work is completed. This is a follow-up to issue #2425 to ensure consistency with the features specification.

issues.title: Support "RawValue" non-converted values
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add a RawValue payload wrapper that tells converters not to apply conversion, allowing users to pass non-converted values directly without SDK transformation.

issues.title: Remove old workflow run operation token format
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Remove support for the old workflow run operation token format and treat all unparseable tokens as handler errors. Also remove any remaining support for operation IDs.

issues.title: `temporal-serviceclient` library is incompatible with `protobuf-java` 4.x
issues.author: RomanVlasenko
issues.summary: The temporal-serviceclient library uses GeneratedMessageV3 which is deprecated and removed in protobuf-java 4.x, causing NoSuchMethodError at runtime when used with protobuf 4.x despite documentation claiming compatibility.

issues.title: workflow_task_execution_failed metric sometime doesn't have `failure_reason` tag
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The workflow_task_execution_failed metric is missing the failure_reason tag in some cases. This inconsistency makes it difficult to diagnose task failures through metrics.

issues.title: Expose Workflow cancel cause/reason
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add support for exposing workflow cancellation cause/reason to workflows receiving cancels, and allow users to provide this information when issuing cancels from clients or commands.

issues.title: Adding a new parameter type List to a workflow input causes the data converter to fail
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Adding a new parameter of generic type List to a workflow input causes the data converter to fail with a ClassCastException during replay, while non-generic parameters work correctly. This is a bug in Java's inconsistent handling of generic vs non-generic parameter types.

issues.title: Marker Commands being sent with empty names in the wild
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Marker commands are being sent to the server with empty names, causing BadRecordMarkerAttributes errors on workflow completion. The issue appears to occur when a marker command is constructed during replay, then sent after replay transitions to false.

issues.title: temporal-test-server for ARM64
issues.author: kmeelu
issues.summary: Feature request to add ARM64 (Mac and Linux) distribution support for temporal-test-server, which is currently only available for AMD64. This is needed to access the start_time_skipping test environment for validating wait_condition behavior on ARM64-based Macs.

issues.title: Support musl-based build of test server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for musl-based test server binary in Java SDK releases. The test server should be distributed as an asset with a clear naming convention for use with temporal.download.

issues.title: Support Priority Annotations
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Request to add support for attaching priority to workflows and activities in the Java SDK. This feature aligns with the broader Temporal feature set described in a cross-repository feature request.

issues.title: Pure opentelemetry based tracing support instead of using tracershim
issues.author: vijjayy81
issues.summary: Request to provide native OpenTelemetry-based tracing support instead of relying on the OpenTracing shim. Currently the Java SDK uses OpenTracing with an OpenTelemetry adapter, but a direct OpenTelemetry integration module would be more straightforward.

issues.title: Add `patched()` and `deprecatePatch()` APIs
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: Add `patched()` and `deprecatePatch()` APIs to the Java SDK for managing workflow versioning and patching, following Core's implementation pattern. May also deprecate the existing `GetVersion` API.

issues.title: [Bug] Test environment sleep hangs on child workflows
issues.author: ksapchuk
issues.summary: Test environment sleep hangs when executing workflows with async child workflows started via startChild(). The same test passes when using start() instead of execute(), indicating a time-skipping test server issue with child workflow handling.

issues.title: [Bug] Cancelling an activity results in `FailedPrecondition: ACTIVITY_UNKNOWN` error on time skipping server
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: Cancelling an activity in the same workflow task where it completes causes the time-skipping test server to return an ACTIVITY_UNKNOWN error and get stuck, while the official server handles this gracefully.

issues.title: Support testing Schedules
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: User requests testing support for Schedules in Java SDK without requiring a server instance, similar to TestWorkflowEnvironment.createLocal() available in TypeScript SDK.

issues.title: Special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to implement special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes in the Java SDK, as described in the features repository issue #576.

issues.title: Removing a `Workflow.getVersion` with a succeeding `Workflow.sideEffect` causes NDE
issues.author: taonic
issues.summary: Removing a Workflow.getVersion call while keeping a following Workflow.sideEffect causes a NullDataException (NDE) during workflow replay. The issue occurs because the state machine expects a SideEffect marker but receives a Version marker instead after getVersion removal.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment issue with setting search attributes in ContinueAsNewOptions
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not properly set search attributes when using ContinueAsNewOptions. Setting typed search attributes via ContinueAsNewOptions.setTypedSearchAttributes() or the deprecated setSearchAttributes() method does not carry over to the continued workflow execution.

issues.title: Provide client from activity context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Users should be able to access a Temporal client from within activity code via the ActivityExecutionContext. This would provide a way to interact with the Temporal API directly from activities, similar to workflow context capabilities.

issues.title: Access to workflow/activity instance from context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to provide access to workflow and activity instances from their respective contexts through methods like ActivityExecutionContext.getInstance() and Workflow.getInstance(), enabling better context inspection and debugging capabilities.

issues.title: Clarify `UnableToAcquireLockException`
issues.author: GSmithApps
issues.summary: The `UnableToAcquireLockException` error message lacks clarity and context that would help users understand the issue. A PR improves the exception message to provide better guidance based on community feedback and clarification from maintainers.

issues.title: Nexus error rehydration
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for Nexus Error rehydration in the Java SDK, matching the functionality implemented in the Go SDK (PR #1751).

issues.title: WorkflowLock.tryLock should not create a timer if the lock is available
issues.author: smax48
issues.summary: WorkflowLock.tryLock creates unnecessary timers even when the lock is immediately available, potentially impacting performance and Temporal Cloud costs. The issue requests short-circuiting execution to avoid calling Workflow.await if the lock is already acquired.

issues.title: Failure to allocate thread can lock up local activities
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Local activity queue stops processing tasks when thread allocation fails due to OutOfMemoryError, causing a silent deadlock in the local activity worker while the rest of the system continues running. The queue callback only catches InterruptedException, allowing the OutOfMemoryError to propagate and terminate the queue processing thread.

issues.title: Manual completion client does unlimited retries for non-retryable error
issues.author: lazy-ninja
issues.summary: ManualActivityCompletionClient performs unlimited retries on non-retryable errors like gRPC message size exceeding limits. When completing an async activity with a payload larger than 4MB, the client retries instead of failing fast.

issues.title: Consider renaming WorkflowStub.update => WorkflowStub.executeUpdate
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: Proposal to rename WorkflowStub.update to WorkflowStub.executeUpdate in the Java SDK to align with naming conventions used across all Temporal SDKs, where 'execute' methods return results.

issues.title: `taskTimeoutWillRescheduleTheTaskOnTheGlobalList ` on the test server is flaky
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: A test called `taskTimeoutWillRescheduleTheTaskOnTheGlobalList` is flaky on the test server and doesn't pass consistently. The issue indicates a timing or race condition in the task timeout and rescheduling logic.

issues.title: [Bug] CI build will soon get broken due to GHA dropping support for node16-based actions
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: GitHub Actions is enforcing Node16 EOL, requiring actions to use Node20. This breaks compatibility with GLIBC 2.27-based runners used to support older Linux distributions, potentially causing CI build failures in release workflows.

issues.title: Mock Workflow.currentTimeMillis() return value in test environment
issues.author: IgorMaj
issues.summary: User requested a way to mock Workflow.currentTimeMillis() in test environments. The issue was resolved by pointing out the existing setInitialTime() method in TestEnvironmentOptions.

issues.title: Add an interceptor for listExecutions
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add an interceptor for WorkflowClient.listExecutions API. The request also includes exposing the constructor of WorkflowExecutionMetadata for better flexibility.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not allow signalWithStart when workflow already exists
issues.author: rpost
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not allow signalWithStart when a workflow already exists, unlike standalone Temporal servers. This causes test failures when attempting to use signalWithStart on pre-existing workflows.

issues.title: Do runtime check to ensure update validator has the same parameter signature as update it validates
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add runtime validation to ensure update validator methods have matching parameter signatures with the update methods they validate. This prevents runtime errors from mismatched method signatures.

issues.title: Clear MDC context after each Task
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Users may inadvertently leave MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context) set after activity or nexus task execution, causing context to leak between unrelated tasks when thread pools are reused. The request is to automatically clear MDC context after each task completes.

issues.title: `Workflow.await(duration, condition)` does not automatically cancel the timer if the condition is resolved
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Workflow.await(duration, condition) should automatically cancel the timer when the condition is resolved early, rather than requiring users to manually manage cancellation scopes.

issues.title: Add WorkflowIdConflictPolicy in child workflow options
issues.author: AndresBena19
issues.summary: Feature request to add WorkflowIdConflictPolicy support to ChildWorkflowOptions in the Java SDK. This option was added to WorkflowOptions but is not available for child workflows, though it requires Temporal Server support first.

issues.title: Removing a `Workflow.GetVersion` call can cause NDE if there are multiple parallel workflow threads running.
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Removing a Workflow.GetVersion call can cause NullDeferenceException when multiple parallel workflow threads are running, because GetVersion blocks the current thread and its removal changes execution order during replay.

issues.title: Test environment hangs if activity is not defined, and `scheduleToStartTimeout` is ignored
issues.author: rocketraman
issues.summary: Test environment hangs indefinitely when an unregistered activity is called, with scheduleToStartTimeout being ignored. Discussion clarifies that timeout applies to scheduling, not to activity type registration, leading to documentation clarification as the resolution.

issues.title: Springboot workflow implementation with non default constructors fail in 1.26.0
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Workflow implementations with non-default constructors that can be autowired by Spring fail in version 1.26.0 with an error about missing default constructor or @WorkflowInit annotation.

issues.title: Support workflow init in our spring boot integration
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The Spring Boot integration for Temporal Java SDK does not support the @WorkflowInit annotation on workflow constructors. Users can use this feature with direct SDK usage, but it's blocked by Spring's bean initialization mechanism.

issues.title: Allow for API key authentication instead of mTLS in Spring Boot Autoconfigure
issues.author: chriso153
issues.summary: Request to add API key authentication support in Spring Boot Autoconfigure for Temporal Cloud connections. Currently only mTLS is supported, requiring users to write custom code for API key authentication.

issues.title: metric not exposed without workersAutoDiscovery property when using spring boot actuator.
issues.author: GwiYeong
issues.summary: Temporal metrics are not exposed through Spring Boot Actuator when the `workersAutoDiscovery` property is not configured. The issue only appears for applications using only the workflow client without starting workers, but metrics require this property to be present even as a dummy value.

issues.title: Workflow update with start does not pass Workflow arguments
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: WorkflowClient.updateWithStart does not pass workflow arguments when starting a new workflow. The update operation arguments are incorrectly being passed as workflow arguments instead of the actual workflow arguments provided to the method.

issues.title: Workflow update with start cannot use a `UpdateWithStartWorkflowOperation` created from a String update name
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: UpdateWithStartWorkflowOperation created from a String update name cannot be used with WorkflowClient.updateWithStart(). The API should accept any valid UpdateWithStartWorkflowOperation regardless of how it was constructed.

issues.title: Auto-skip time in time-skipping testing environment when waiting on update result
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to auto-skip time when waiting on update results in time-skipping testing environments, similar to the existing auto-skip behavior for workflow results.

issues.title: Null pointer exception on passing empty search attribute in workflow options
issues.author: lazy-ninja
issues.summary: NullPointerException is thrown when passing empty search attributes in workflow options. The issue occurs when SearchAttributesUtil.encodeTyped() returns null for empty search attributes, and this null value is then passed to StartWorkflowExecutionRequest.setSearchAttributes(), which doesn't accept null.

issues.title: Add Nexus failure_reason metric tag
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add a failure_reason metric tag to the nexus_task_execution_failed metric in the Java SDK, following the pattern established in the Go SDK.

issues.title: Add "summary" to activities
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add an optional 'summary' field to activities as part of the user metadata MVP. This enhancement involves marking the feature as experimental and populating the user metadata on the activity command.

issues.title: Add high-level workflow describe
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add a high-level `describe()` method to workflow stubs that returns a `WorkflowExecutionDescription` with execution details and access to the raw describe response. The method should be interceptable and follow the design patterns from TypeScript, Python, and .NET SDKs.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not support workflows with start delay
issues.author: imalao
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not respect workflow start delays, causing workflows to start immediately instead of at the scheduled time when using TestWorkflowEnvironment.sleep().

issues.title: Support actual versions of spring boot
issues.author: mvkirillov
issues.summary: User asked about compatibility support for Spring Boot versions 3.2.x and 3.3.x. The maintainer clarified that the Spring Boot integration already supports 3.x versions and directed the user to community forums for support questions.

issues.title: RetryOption.setMaximumAttempts(0) seems broken for LocalActivities
issues.author: ghaskins
issues.summary: RetryOption.setMaximumAttempts(0) is not working correctly for local activities. When set to 0 (which should mean unlimited retries), local activities fail after 0 retry attempts instead of retrying indefinitely, inconsistent with both documentation and regular activity behavior.

issues.title: Implement Nexus operation cancellation type
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement Nexus operation cancellation type similar to ChildWorkflowCancellationType to support different cancellation behaviors. This requires server-side support for recording the NexusOperationCancelDelivered history event.

issues.title: Time-skipping past activitys startToCloseTimeout causes worker not to close
issues.author: ikonst
issues.summary: When using time-skipping in test environment, if an activity's startToCloseTimeout is exceeded during the test, worker.runUntil() hangs instead of closing properly because it fails to handle the abandoned activity completion.

issues.title: Handle Nexus links
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for Nexus bi-directional links in the Java SDK to enable communication patterns similar to those implemented in the Go SDK.

issues.title: Show update handler and ID in logging context
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to include update handler and ID information in logging context for the Java SDK to improve observability and debugging of update operations.

issues.title: Call ShutdownWorker API on worker shutdown
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The Java SDK should call the ShutdownWorker API when a worker is being shut down, aligning with cross-SDK feature requirements. Test server support is also needed for this functionality.

issues.title: Add Nexus Support to TestWorkflowExtension
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add Nexus support to TestWorkflowExtension to enable testing of workflows that use Nexus operations.

issues.title: Fix inconsistency in javadoc for WorkflowInterface
issues.author: mackler
issues.summary: The example code in the @WorkflowInterface javadoc annotation documentation does not behave as described in the accompanying text, creating inconsistency and confusion for developers reading the documentation.

issues.title: Add TestNexusEnvironment similar to TestActivityEnvironment
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to add TestNexusEnvironment for testing Nexus operations without requiring a full workflow, similar to the existing TestActivityEnvironment.

issues.title: Test Server: Fill in namespace capabilities in describe response
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add namespace capabilities to the Test Server's describe workflow response, aligning with the temporal server implementation as referenced in PR #6256.

issues.title: Add Nexus Worker interceptor
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for Nexus worker interceptor to WorkerInterceptor, enabling hook points similar to those available for ActivityInboundCallsInterceptor.

issues.title: Test Server: Add support for user metadata
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for user metadata on workflow start and commands in the Test Server, implementing the API changes from temporalio/api.

issues.title: workflow metadata query
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to add support for workflow metadata query in the Java SDK, aligning with feature specifications and Go SDK implementation.

issues.title: MVP support for user meta data on workflows and events
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for user metadata on workflows and events, including fixed summary/details on workflow start events and summary on timer start events to serve as timer identifiers.

issues.title: Test Server does not treat internal errors as retryable from Nexus operations
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Test Server does not correctly treat internal errors from Nexus operations as retryable. When a Nexus operation throws an internal error (RuntimeException), the test server marks it as non-retryable when it should be retryable.

issues.title: Signal w/ Start API Improvements - Java
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: The BatchRequest API for Signal w/ Start is difficult to use due to inflexible ordering constraints and lacks support for other operations like Update. This feature request proposes deprecating BatchRequest in favor of a more intuitive, consistent API similar to updateWithStart.

issues.title: UpdateHandle should have a getResult method
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Add a synchronous getResult() convenience method to UpdateHandle to make the common synchronous use case more usable. Currently requires calling getResultAsync().get() which is verbose for what should be a simple operation.

issues.title: Nexus handler - well known Temporal error translation
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement Nexus handler support for well-known Temporal error translation in the Java SDK, replicating functionality from the Go SDK PR #1626.

issues.title: Add `getMetricsScope` to `WorkflowOutboundCallsInterceptor`
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: User requests adding `getMetricsScope` method to `WorkflowOutboundCallsInterceptor` to enable custom tags on metrics emitted within workflows.

issues.title: Async activity inputs potential memory leak
issues.author: hansen-jake
issues.summary: Activity inputs are held in strong references by WorkflowOutboundCallsInterceptor$ActivityInput even after activities complete, preventing garbage collection and causing memory leaks in workflows with multiple async activities.

issues.title: `Workflow.newUntypedActivityStub` does not inherit default options the same way `Workflow.newActivityStub` does
issues.author: idubrov
issues.summary: Workflow.newUntypedActivityStub does not inherit default options from WorkflowImplementationOptions.Builder customizer, unlike Workflow.newActivityStub. The untyped variant requires explicit options to be passed and ignores the configured defaults.

issues.title: Thread `LocalActivitySlotSupplierQueue` prevent JVM from termination
issues.author: nikoncode
issues.summary: LocalActivitySlotSupplierQueue thread persists after WorkerFactory.shutdown() is called, preventing JVM termination when workers are not started. The thread is created in the constructor but shutdown is only called if the worker was started.

issues.title: Missing Attempt value on MDC for logging purposes
issues.author: javiercanillas
issues.summary: Workflow and activity execution logs are missing the Attempt number in MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context). The request is to add a new LoggerTag ATTEMPT and populate it in MDC alongside existing fields like WorkflowId and ActivityId.

issues.title: Schedules without a catch up window use the min catch up window instead of the default catch up window
issues.author: dcohen8128
issues.summary: The Java SDK incorrectly uses the minimum catch-up window (10 seconds) instead of the default (1 year) when no catch-up window is specified in a SchedulePolicy. This was a bug in versions before 1.24.0 that has been fixed.

issues.title: Fix workflow start delay docs to say signal does not interrupt delay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation issue: workflow start delay documentation incorrectly states that signals can interrupt the delay. This needs to be corrected to clarify that signals do not interrupt workflow start delays.

issues.title: Type safe async update API
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request for a type-safe async update API in the Java SDK that works similarly to WorkflowClient.start, returning an update handle instead of using stub/proxy-based approach.

issues.title: Workflow.newExternalWorkflowStub
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow.newExternalWorkflowStub() rejects interfaces that don't have @WorkflowInterface annotation, even though WorkflowClient.newWorkflowStub() accepts such interfaces. This inconsistency prevents using base interfaces containing only signal/query/update methods for external workflow communication.

issues.title: Interceptor Configurations - exclusions based on workflow/activity type and task queue
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Feature request to add configuration-based exclusions for interceptors to prevent certain workflows and activities from being intercepted based on their type or task queue. The maintainer suggested this is better handled programmatically through conditional logic within interceptors rather than as a configuration option.

issues.title: Carry over search attributes on continue-as-new if none are explicitly specified
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Search attributes should be automatically carried over when using continue-as-new in Java SDK if none are explicitly specified, matching the behavior of other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: Include Package Version Information in manifest
issues.author: melloware
issues.summary: The Java SDK's JAR manifest is incomplete and lacks package version information. This prevents developers from retrieving the SDK version at runtime using reflection (e.g., `WorkflowClient.class.getPackage().getImplementationVersion()`), which is needed for tools like Quarkus Extensions and DevOps dashboards.

issues.title: Workflow-init support
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request for a workflow initialization method that executes before any signals or updates are received, allowing handlers to use pre-initialized values.

issues.title: Enable Nexus test server docker functional tests once 1.25 is released
issues.author: pdoerner
issues.summary: Nexus functional tests using an external test server are currently disabled because Nexus is only fully supported in OSS 1.25.0+. These tests should be re-enabled once version 1.25.0 is officially released.

issues.title: Child workflow cancellation can trigger SDK event loop without a WFT Started
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Child workflow cancellation can trigger the SDK event loop without a WFT (Workflow Task) Started event, causing non-deterministic behavior. This issue requires versioning the fix to maintain determinism.

issues.title: CI: Get rid of buildjet-2vcpu-ubuntu-1804 GHA runners
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: GitHub's Runner Agent now has dependencies incompatible with Ubuntu 18.04, forcing an urgent migration away from buildjet-2vcpu-ubuntu-1804 runners used for Test Server builds. This blocks Java SDK releases until resolved.

issues.title: WorkflowTask failure because of an invalid state transition in LocalActivity state machine
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: LocalActivity state machine enters an invalid state when executed within a detached cancellation scope after a child workflow cancellation. The state transition REQUEST_PREPAREDNON_REPLAY_WORKFLOW_TASK_STARTED fails, causing WorkflowTask execution to fail.

issues.title: Support schedule search attribute update
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for updating schedule search attributes in the Java SDK, following the feature specification and Go SDK implementation.

issues.title: Generated Google proto classes are part of generated service client classes
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The generated temporal-serviceclient JAR includes duplicate Google Protocol Buffer classes that are already available as dependencies (protobuf-java and proto-google-common-protos), causing classpath duplication warnings.

issues.title: Revisit local activity backpressure logic w/ no-max slot suppliers
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Local activity backpressure logic needs revisiting for slot suppliers without defined upper limits. Currently defaults to 100 slots for unlimited suppliers, but a more optimal default may be possible.

issues.title: Better toString representations on service stub options
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add missing toString() implementations for OperatorServiceStubsOptions and CloudServiceStubsOptions, and fix WorkflowServiceStubsOptions.toString() to include inherited fields.

issues.title: Test server should treat update/poll-update as long-poll
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Test server's update/poll-update endpoints should implement proper long-poll timeout behavior instead of potentially throwing timeout exceptions. The timeout should either match the get-history call's 20-second hardcoded value or be set to 10 seconds before the user-set deadline.

issues.title: Support "query" when listing schedules
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for query filters when listing schedules in the Java SDK, matching the existing functionality available for listing workflows.

issues.title: Add option to configure the deadline of `ChannelManager#getServerCapabilities`
issues.author: fextr
issues.summary: The Java SDK's `getSystemInfo` call (used in `ChannelManager#getServerCapabilities`) intentionally overrides the RPC timeout configuration, forcing users to rely on the deprecated `healthCheckAttemptTimeout` option. A request to add a separate `getSystemInfoTimeout` configuration option to allow independent deadline control.

issues.title: NoClassDefFoundError: com/google/protobuf/GeneratedMessageV3 | Spring 3.3.1
issues.author: Lavmee
issues.summary: NoClassDefFoundError occurs when creating WorkflowServiceStubs Bean with Spring 3.3.1 due to protobuf version conflict. The issue arises from protobuf 4.26.1 used by DGS framework being incompatible with grpc-java.

issues.title: Test server sometimes fails to include signal in first WFT
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: Test server occasionally fails to include signal events in the first workflow task for SDK Python when signals are sent before the worker starts, particularly on macOS Intel runners. The signal event is sometimes missing from the first WFT activation, causing the workflow to process start_workflow before signal_workflow.

issues.title: MDC custom naming convention
issues.author: nikoncode
issues.summary: Add extension point to control MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context) key naming conventions in the Java SDK worker. Currently MDC keys are statically defined, but users need flexibility to implement custom naming conventions that align with Python SDK and other services.

issues.title: Java SDK does not have option to register workflow name statically
issues.author: ftkurt
issues.summary: Java SDK lacks a method to register workflows with static names during registration. Users need this to share workflow definitions across different language platforms (Go, Python) via protobuf enums, which annotations alone cannot support.

issues.title: @Profile annotation is not working on @WorkflowImpl with `workers-auto-discovery`
issues.author: hedonihilist
issues.summary: When workers-auto-discovery is enabled in Spring Boot autoconfigure, the @Profile annotation on @WorkflowImpl classes is ignored, causing workflows to be discovered even when their profile condition doesn't match. The ClassPathScanningCandidateComponentProvider scanner lacks Environment configuration needed to evaluate @Conditional annotations.

issues.title: Missing metric reporting in local activity execution
issues.author: longquanzheng
issues.summary: Local activity execution metrics (temporal_activity_succeed_endtoend_latency and temporal_local_activity_execution_failed) are not being reported in production, despite being implemented identically to normal activity metrics. End-to-end latency metrics are missing while execution metrics are reported, and execution failures appear not to be captured.

issues.title: Allow customization of OTel span tags
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Java SDK uses different OpenTelemetry span tag names (workflowId, runId) compared to other SDKs (temporalWorkflowID, temporalRunID). Request to allow customization of OTel span tags so users can make them consistent across SDKs.

issues.title: Workflow-friendly concurrency control
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request for a workflow-friendly concurrency control mechanism (mutex/semaphore) that is reentrant and deterministic for use within Temporal workflow coroutines, including signal and update handlers.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal testing issue with no description provided. The issue appears to be a placeholder or incomplete submission with only the word 'testing' in the body.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Placeholder issue with minimal content marked as testing.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Placeholder testing issue with minimal content. No actual problem statement or test framework question is provided.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with only the word 'testing' as the title and body. Unclear what the actual testing-related problem or request is.

issues.title: WorkflowHistoryLoader fails to load decoded event history
issues.author: ddavidyuk
issues.summary: WorkflowHistoryLoader fails to load event history downloaded from Temporal UI with the 'Decode History' option enabled. The UI produces a JSON format that is incompatible with the SDK's protobuf parser, causing InvalidProtocolBufferException when attempting to load the history for testing and replay purposes.

issues.title: Concurrent Modification Exception when executing workflow with local activities
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: LocalActivityMeteringHelper throws ConcurrentModificationException when executing workflow tasks with local activities due to illegal modifications to its underlying data structure during newWFTStarting calls.

issues.title: Confirm non-utf8 proto string behavior
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Investigate whether Java proto library allows non-UTF8 strings in proto messages, following a similar validation gap discovered in Go. Determine compatibility and plan mitigation if needed.

issues.title: Java SDK is not reporting workflow_failures from the code path via the FailWorkflowExceptionTypes
issues.author: jlacefie
issues.summary: Java SDK is not reporting workflow_failures metrics when exceptions are thrown by the SDK itself (such as NonDeterministicException), causing a discrepancy between SDK metrics and Temporal Cloud metrics.

issues.title: Scheduled workflow retries do not work
issues.author: mikita-charnukhin
issues.summary: Retry policies configured on scheduled workflows via RetryOptions are not being applied when the workflow fails. The retry configuration is ignored during the mapping from Java SDK objects to protobuf service client objects, causing scheduled workflow retries to either fail to work or use an incorrect default retry policy.

issues.title: TestActivityEnvironment does not work with Asynchronous Activity Completion
issues.author: bjab
issues.summary: TestActivityEnvironment throws NullPointerException when testing asynchronous activities with doNotCompleteOnReturn(). The test framework expects activities to complete, fail, or be cancelled, but async activities that don't complete on return leave result fields null.

issues.title: Java SDK `StartUpdate` waits outside of intercepted call
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The Java SDK executes StartUpdate and waits for the update to reach the required stage outside of the intercepted call, differing from other SDKs where this wait happens inside the interceptor. This prevents interceptors from running logic after the StartUpdate call completes.

issues.title: Expose UpdateID in an update handler
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to expose UpdateID in update handlers to allow users to use it as a unique primary key for handlers in the Java SDK.

issues.title: activity_succeed_endtoend_latency not reported when completing the activity with ActivityCompletionClient
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: The activity_succeed_endtoend_latency metric is not reported when completing activities using ActivityCompletionClient.complete() for manual async completion. This metric should be captured when in-process async activities are completed manually.

issues.title: Provide methods to wait for all handlers to finish
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Users need methods to wait for all handlers to finish when continuing as new or exiting a workflow. This requires explicit user specification since the SDK cannot automatically determine the desired behavior.

issues.title: Warn or error when update handlers dangle across CAN or workflow exit
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Add warnings or errors when update handlers don't complete before workflow exits due to cancellation or workflow end. The proposal includes methods like `all_handlers_finished()` to allow workflows to wait for handler completion, with configurable policies to warn or abandon unfinished handlers.

issues.title: Upgrade grpc version , version 1.54.0 crashes JVM on Alpine
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: gRPC version 1.54.0 causes JVM crashes on Alpine Linux. This is a compatibility issue that was resolved by updating the Java SDK's gRPC dependency in v1.28.0.

issues.title: Add the ability to specify worker identity for each worker
issues.author: Duzhinsky
issues.summary: Feature request to add worker-level identity configuration in WorkerOptions. Currently, only client-level identity is available, but users need per-worker identity specification for multi-worker deployments operating on different queues.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment, TestWorkflowRule, TestWorkflowExtension - auto-register search attributes from WorkflowStub
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Feature request to automatically register search attributes from WorkflowStub in test environments, eliminating the need for explicit pre-registration in test code.

issues.title: Querying a running workflow makes it spam previously logged messages
issues.author: rorueda
issues.summary: Querying a running workflow causes previously logged messages to be replayed and logged again. During workflow query operations, the replaying flag is incorrectly set to false, causing exception logs to be duplicated when the workflow is replayed to handle the query.

issues.title: Add the ability to keep heartbeating while the worker is shutting down
issues.author: mintybayleaf
issues.summary: Worker shutdown immediately terminates activity heartbeats, preventing activities from completing during the graceful shutdown period. Users request the ability to maintain heartbeating during shutdown so activities can finish work within the awaitTermination timeout.

issues.title: Send original update request back in accept/reject response
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update request needs to be sent back in accept/reject responses to the server. This aligns with the Go SDK implementation (PR #1480) to ensure proper round-trip of update request data.

issues.title: KotlinObjectMapperFactory is not forwards compatible
issues.author: Sineaggi
