issues.summary: KotlinObjectMapperFactory crashes with MethodNotFoundError when upgrading jackson kotlin library due to reliance on deprecated KotlinModule constructor. The fix requires using the builder pattern as a fallback or exclusively to ensure forward compatibility.

issues.title: Wrap GRPC::CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED in an SDK Timeout exception for Update
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to wrap gRPC CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors in a custom SDK Timeout exception for Update operations, so users only need to catch one predictable exception instead of handling multiple gRPC error types.

issues.title: Disallow continue as new in update handlers
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the ability to call continue-as-new in update handlers for the Java SDK. A previous decision to allow this was reverted across SDKs, but Java still has this functionality implemented and should be updated to disallow it.

issues.title: It's impossible to send unset duration
issues.author: Duzhinsky
issues.summary: null Duration values in options classes like SchedulePolicy are sent as zero duration instead of being treated as unset, causing the server to apply minimum defaults instead of expected defaults (e.g., 10 second MinCatchupWindow instead of 1 year DefaultCatchupWindow).

issues.title: Native image descriptor for GraalVM in the temporal-spring-boot-starter-alpha
issues.author: Hnoianko
issues.summary: Request to add native image descriptors for GraalVM support in temporal-spring-boot-starter-alpha. Users are experiencing build failures when creating Spring Boot native images due to missing or conflicting native-image configuration files.

issues.title: Extend TestWorkflowExtension to support specifying a custom task queue name
issues.author: Hnoianko
issues.summary: Feature request to extend TestWorkflowExtension to allow specifying a custom task queue name for the worker, enabling more flexible integration testing scenarios.

issues.title: Call describe namespace on worker start
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to call describe namespace on worker startup to validate namespace configuration and detect issues early. This aligns with the features repository initiative to improve worker initialization.

issues.title: Cloud Operations API Client
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Implement a separate Cloud Operations API client for the Java SDK using cloud protos, mirroring implementations in other SDKs. The client should be marked as experimental.

issues.title: Set Temporal-Namespace header on every namespace-specific gRPC request
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add automatic Temporal-Namespace header to all namespace-specific gRPC requests in the Java SDK via an interceptor, eliminating the need for manual namespace configuration.

issues.title: Java SDK seems to not play well with Replay tests. Setting child workflow ID using Temporal library seems to be throwing a non-deterministic error
issues.author: gauravojha
issues.summary: Java SDK replay tests fail with non-deterministic error when child workflows use dynamically generated IDs derived from parent workflow ID. The replayer cannot match the child workflow ID generated at runtime with the ID stored in the event history.

issues.title: Allow users to implement update asynchronously in Java natively
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Allow update handlers to be completed asynchronously rather than blocking threads, similar to how activities support manual completion. This would enable workflows to handle multiple concurrent updates without excessive thread consumption.

issues.title: Local activity support for next-retry-delay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for next-retry-delay in local activity application failures, allowing local activities to return retry delay information similar to regular activities.

issues.title: Ability to specify activity timeouts via annotation in Java SDK
issues.author: luispollo
issues.summary: Request to add timeout configuration at the activity method level via annotation (e.g., @ActivityTimeouts or extension to @MethodRetry) instead of requiring configuration at the activity stub level, which forces interface fragmentation for per-method settings.

issues.title: Async Activity support for Java async API
issues.author: qinghui-xu
issues.summary: Feature request to support async activities in Java SDK by allowing activity methods to return CompletableFuture/CompletablePromise without blocking. The discussion explores whether activities should be able to handle Java's native async APIs and determinism constraints.

issues.title: ScheduleClient is missing an option to add interceptors
issues.author: dano
issues.summary: ScheduleClient lacks an API to add interceptors (ScheduleClientCallsInterceptor or ScheduleClientInterceptor) for request interception and customization, following the pattern established by WorkflowClient.

issues.title: Add toString method to WorkflowServiceStubsOptions
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Add toString, equals, and hashCode methods to WorkflowServiceStubsOptions and related *Options classes for better logging and debugging support.

issues.title: Failed promise before calling allOf is not failing the wrapped promise.
issues.author: awx-michael-wang
issues.summary: Promise.allOf() ignores failures in promises that have already failed before being passed to allOf(), causing workflows to complete successfully when they should fail. The issue is in AllOfPromise#addPromise which only handles non-completed promises.

issues.title: Make startUpdate users aware that it's synchronous w/ worker
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Users need better awareness that startUpdate is synchronous with the worker and requires explicit opt-in. This is a documentation and API usability enhancement to make the behavior more discoverable and intentional.

issues.title: Fail workflow task on illegal calls in `Workflow.await`
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add validation to fail workflow tasks when illegal state-mutating calls (like activities) are made within Workflow.await(), which is expected to be idempotent. This will help catch bugs in workflow implementations that violate the idempotency requirement.

issues.title: Activity options merging logic is not correct
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity options merging logic is incorrect across six different option sources. The current implementation fails to properly merge options in the documented precedence order, causing unexpected behavior when multiple option sources are specified.

issues.title: [CI] StickyWorkflowDrainShutdownTest.testShutdown is flaky
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: StickyWorkflowDrainShutdownTest.testShutdown is flaky in CI due to a suspected race condition in worker shutdown when no activities are registered.

issues.title: Expose defaultConnection() method to switch between localhost and cloud based on env
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Request to expose a defaultConnection() method that switches between localhost and cloud-based connections based on environment variables, enabling samples to easily run against either local or cloud deployments.

issues.title: Provide way to populate activity execution context for activity unit tests
issues.author: madhav2302
issues.summary: Request to populate activity execution context in TestActivityEnvironment for unit tests without requiring a workflow setup. Currently, developers must create a temporary workflow using TestWorkflowEnvironment to access context information like workflow type.

issues.title: Support for WorkflowIdConflictPolicy
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Support for WorkflowIdConflictPolicy in the Java SDK to align with feature support across Temporal SDKs, as defined in the cross-repository features issue #437.

issues.title: Add SpringBoot integration for `SlotSupplier`s
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add SpringBoot integration configuration options to enable developers to configure slot suppliers in their Spring Boot applications, extending the slot supplier functionality introduced in PR #2014.

issues.title: Add `PauseableSlotSupplier`
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add a new `PauseableSlotSupplier` implementation that wraps other slot suppliers and provides a pause() function for worker tuning as part of the autotuning proposal.

issues.title: [SpringBoot] Add graceful shutdown wait time as property
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to add a configurable graceful shutdown wait time property for the Spring Boot worker factory, preventing application closure before inflight tasks complete.

issues.title: `ReplayWorkflowTaskHandler.failureToWFTResult` does not use a `SeralizationContext` when serializing an exception for a direct query
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: ReplayWorkflowTaskHandler.failureToWFTResult does not use SerializationContext when serializing exceptions for direct queries, potentially causing serialization issues with custom exception handling.

issues.title: Kotlin `ActivityStubExt.execute*` extension functions wrap arguments in list
issues.author: rgrochowicz
issues.summary: Kotlin ActivityStubExt.execute extension functions incorrectly wrap arguments in a list instead of passing them as varargs to the underlying ActivityStub.execute method, causing arguments to be double-wrapped in the ActivityTaskScheduled event.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use macOS M1/ARM runners for all SDK CI
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to use macOS M1/ARM runners for all Java SDK CI pipelines instead of Intel-based runners. This is related to broader Temporal effort to support ARM architecture across SDKs.

issues.title: Investigate bad `isReplaying` value on direct query when workflow is not in cache
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The isReplaying() method incorrectly returns false during workflow replay when a query is executed after a workflow task that doesn't generate commands. This occurs because the replay state is prematurely set to false based on a flawed check in the WorkflowStateMachines class.

issues.title: Bump Protobuf Plugin
issues.author: flaxel
issues.summary: Request to upgrade the Protobuf plugin to v26.0 with breaking changes. Upgrade is blocked by compatibility issues between Proto 4 and grpc-java, requiring investigation of gRPC recommendations before proceeding.

issues.title: [Feature Request] SDK should not return an update handle if the update has not reached the desired state
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to prevent the SDK from returning an update handle if the update hasn't reached the desired state. This ensures clients don't receive incomplete or invalid update results.

issues.title: GrpcRetryer fails without retrying request if "getServiceCapabilities" request fails
issues.author: aleskovets
issues.summary: GrpcRetryer fails to retry requests when the initial serviceCapabilities.get() call fails, instead failing immediately without applying retry policies. This breaks reliability for scenarios where the Temporal server is temporarily unavailable or unhealthy.

issues.title: API key client option
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add a dedicated `setApiKey` method as syntactic sugar for setting API credentials in the Java SDK, potentially as a foundation for future `setCloudApiKey` functionality that could default the target.

issues.title: SpringBoot - add "server-name" property to connection options
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Feature request to add a "server-name" property to Spring Boot connection options, allowing users to override the server authority via ManagedChannelBuilder for scenarios like PrivateLink connectivity. Currently possible through TemporalOptionsCustomizer but adding a dedicated option would improve convenience.

issues.title: RunID is needed oftimes when relying on HasWorkflowSerializationContext in a PayloadCodec or Converter
issues.author: mnichols
issues.summary: Feature request to include RunID in HasWorkflowSerializationContext to help PayloadCodec implementations disambiguate execution runs that have been ContinuedAsNew or Reset. After investigation, the request was closed as the SDK cannot reliably provide the correct RunID in all scenarios.

issues.title: grpc-api-1.54.1.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.1)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Guava dependency vulnerability (CVE-2023-2976) with CVSS 7.1 severity in FileBackedOutputStream allows unauthorized file access on Unix systems through Java's default temporary directory.

issues.title: Have a built-in way to override activityOptions in tests
issues.author: yunmanger1
issues.summary: Request for built-in API to override ActivityOptions in test workflows. Currently, production code uses high retry counts on activities, but tests need low retry counts (maxAttempts=1) and custom queue names without hardcoding production configurations.

issues.title: Configurable workflow exception types at the worker level
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to allow configurable workflow exception types at the worker level, potentially allowing workers to handle exception serialization and behavior differently based on configuration.

issues.title: Upgrade grpc dependencies
issues.author: isacandrei
issues.summary: gRPC dependency versions have breaking changes in v1.59.0+ that move InProcessServerBuilder to a separate artifact. The Java SDK needs to upgrade to support Quarkus and other frameworks using recent gRPC versions.

issues.title: [Temporal Spring-boot Starter] customizing workflow options by workflow type
issues.author: sva02
issues.summary: Spring Boot Starter lacks ability to customize workflow options by workflow type. Unlike the Java SDK which supports type-specific options via `registerWorkflowImplementationTypes()`, the Spring Boot Starter only allows global customization, preventing workflows like scheduled ones from having different failure handling (e.g., failing on NonDeterministicException) than others.

issues.title: Expose next retry delay on Application Failure in all SDKs
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Expose the ability for activities to specify the next retry delay on failure via the ApplicationFailureInfo field, making this feature available across all SDKs. This field was recently added to the API proto definition but needs SDK-level exposure.

issues.title: Verify DynamicWorkflows implementation applies serialization
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: DynamicWorkflow implementation needs to apply serialization context similar to issue #1895 to properly handle data conversion. A fix is proposed that wraps the dataConverter with WorkflowSerializationContext.

issues.title: Add source code to shaded library
issues.author: longquanzheng
issues.summary: Shaded JAR library lacks source code attachment, preventing IDE access to JavaDoc and source code during development. Users must resort to online documentation as a workaround.

issues.title: MDC Context not propogating
issues.author: karunagoyal
issues.summary: MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context) is not propagating to Temporal worker threads when using the Spring Boot SDK. User configured MdcContextPropagator on the workflow client but logs from Temporal activities lack the MDC context.

issues.title: Disable eager activities if task queue rate limits is set
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to disable eager activities when task queue rate limits are configured, to prevent potential performance issues with rate-limited task queues.

issues.title: WorkflowUpdateException incorrectly wrapped by ExecutionException in some edge case
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: WorkflowUpdateException is incorrectly wrapped in ExecutionException during sync update calls when the update request exceeds the server's long poll deadline and the SDK switches to long polling. This unexpected wrapping is confusing to users who didn't await any future.

issues.title: Fix start-workers config
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Configuration parameter for starting workers is incorrectly named 'startWorkers' instead of using the correct configuration key naming convention.

issues.title: Provide WorkflowStatus in WorkflowNotFoundException when signing a workflow
issues.author: longquanzheng
issues.summary: When signaling a closed workflow throws WorkflowNotFoundException, the Java SDK should include the WorkflowStatus to distinguish between workflows that don't exist versus workflows that are closed/completed. Currently developers must make a separate DescribeWorkflowExecution API call to determine the actual state.

issues.title: Workflow stub with only an update method fails
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Workflow stub creation fails when the stub interface only defines an update method without a workflow method. This prevents using update-only workflows through the workflow client stub.

issues.title: Heartbeat activity retries first heartbeat data instead of last
issues.author: rburgst
issues.summary: Activity heartbeats are retrying with the first heartbeat data instead of the last recorded heartbeat, causing retried activities to restart processing with outdated progress information rather than resuming from the last checkpoint.

issues.title: Schedule creation should create tracing span by default
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add automatic tracing span creation when schedules are created in the Java SDK's tracing interceptor. Users should be able to opt-out of this behavior via tracing interceptor options.

issues.title: Tracing context does not propagate into .thenCompose
issues.author: ghaskins
issues.summary: OpenTracing spans are not properly propagated when activities are chained using .thenCompose, resulting in orphaned spans disconnected from the parent workflow span.

issues.title: json-path-2.8.0.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 5.3)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: json-path-2.8.0.jar contains a stack overflow vulnerability (CVE-2023-51074) via the Criteria.parse() method with CVSS score 5.3. The issue affects the temporal-spring-boot-starter-alpha module and was resolved by upgrading to json-path-2.9.0.

issues.title: Missing Retry Policy on Continue-As-New
issues.author: MatthewHou
issues.summary: Retry policy is not propagated when using continue-as-new in Java SDK, and there's no way to explicitly set retry options in ContinueAsNewOptions. Other SDKs (Go, Python, TypeScript) propagate these attributes by default.

issues.title: Worker autotuning - Pollers
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to implement worker autotuning for pollers in the Java SDK, aligning with a broader feature initiative tracked in the features repository.

issues.title: Worker dynamic config
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request for dynamic configuration of worker behavior at runtime. The issue was closed due to uncertainty about implementation approach and architectural changes (particularly Nexus introduction as a potential transport for config changes).

issues.title: TemporalTestServer add support to test schedules
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Request to add schedule testing support to the temporal-test-server for Java SDK. The test server's time-skipping architecture doesn't support concurrent, independent workflow runs needed for proper schedule testing.

issues.title: Add WorkflowImplementationOptions to TestWorkflowExtension
issues.author: mmccawley-chegg
issues.summary: TestWorkflowExtension needs support for WorkflowImplementationOptions to allow configurable behavior like failWorkflowExceptionTypes during testing, currently only using defaults.

issues.title: ktlint-0.47.1.jar: 2 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Two high-severity vulnerabilities (CVE-2023-6481, CVE-2023-6378) in logback-core and logback-classic dependencies used by ktlint-0.47.1, which is a build dependency in the Java SDK's temporal-kotlin module. Both are serialization vulnerabilities enabling denial-of-service attacks.

issues.title: spring-boot-dependencies-2.7.12.pom: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Spring Boot 2.7.12 dependency includes logback-core 1.2.12 with a serialization vulnerability (CVE-2023-6481) that allows attackers to mount Denial-of-Service attacks. Upgrade to logback-core 1.2.13 or later to remediate.

issues.title: Fail task on unknown event when HistoryEvent.worker_may_ignore is false
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add logic to fail tasks when workers encounter unknown history events that they must handle (when HistoryEvent.worker_may_ignore is false). Currently workers may silently ignore or mishandle critical events.

issues.title: If an update request continues-as-new the SDK should complete the request with a specific response
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: When an update request calls continue-as-new on a workflow, the SDK should fail or complete the update with a specific response to indicate the workflow continued as new rather than the update succeeding.

issues.title: Support Java Modules
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Java SDK cannot be used as a named Java module due to split packages across multiple JAR files (temporal.sdk and temporal.serviceclient both contain io.temporal.internal packages), preventing proper module-info.java or Automatic-Module-Name support.

issues.title: `toProtoDuration` may throw an `ArithmeticException` if Duration is too large
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The `toProtoDuration` method throws an `ArithmeticException` when converting a Java `Duration` to protobuf `Duration` if the Duration value is too large. The method uses `toMillis()` which can overflow for very large durations; the fix should convert seconds directly and truncate nanoseconds to millisecond precision.

issues.title: Support a promise-based await
issues.author: ghaskins
issues.summary: Request for a promise-based alternative to the blocking await() function in workflows, allowing developers to coordinate mixed event classes like activities and signals without blocking. The proposed API would return a Promise that resolves based on a predicate evaluation or timeout.

issues.title: `No PayloadConverter is registered for an encoding: binary/null`
issues.author: jocho-here
issues.summary: User encountered a DataConverterException for 'binary/null' encoding in Java SDK. The issue was resolved by clarifying that NullPayloadConverter is already part of the default data converter and must be explicitly registered if not using default settings.

issues.title: sdk-java 1.22.3 breaks queries after testEnv.sleep
issues.author: karneyli
issues.summary: SDK-Java 1.22.3 broke the ability to query workflow executions after calling testEnv.sleep(). Queries fail with WorkflowQueryException after testEnv.sleep() in tests, though this functionality worked in v1.22.2.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Tag workflow_task_execution_failed with error type
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to tag workflow_task_execution_failed metrics with error type information for better observability. This follows feature request #231 in the features repository.

issues.title: Flag signal after workflow complete as NonDeterminism
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Workflow signal handlers with non-deterministic logic that would fail on replay should throw NonDeterministicException instead of IllegalStateException. Currently, signals received after workflow completion result in an error that doesn't properly indicate a determinism violation.

issues.title: io.grpc:grpc-core:1.59.0 Has a breaking ABI change requiring us to update our grpc dependency
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Grpc-java v1.59.0 introduced an ABI breaking change requiring the SDK to update its grpc and protoc dependencies to v1.36.0 or later to maintain compatibility with compiled code.

issues.title: Workflow executions frozen after Temporal exception
issues.author: brunomascijp
issues.summary: Workflow executions became frozen in Running state after a NullPointerException in FailureConverter.failureToException during stack trace processing. The issue caused WorkflowTask state machine failures that prevented progress, requiring worker restarts to recover.

issues.title: Support bind address for test server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to support configurable bind address for test server, allowing binding to specific addresses like 127.0.0.1 instead of defaulting to all addresses.

issues.title: Java SDK should verify it replays up to `StartedEventId` when processing a workflow task
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Java SDK doesn't verify it replays up to the StartedEventId sent in workflow task polls, which can cause incomplete workflow history replay if fetching from GetWorkflowExecutionHistory after receiving partial history with no cached execution on stale history nodes.

issues.title: Support cancellation of long client calls
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Users need a way to cancel long-running client calls such as GetWorkflowResult or GetUpdateResult, with optional timeout support. This should follow common Java practices for cancellation.

issues.title: Remove WorkflowClientCallsInterceptor.pollWorkflowUpdate
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the WorkflowClientCallsInterceptor.pollWorkflowUpdate method as it is unnecessarily interceptable, inconsistent with how workflow result retrieval works in the Java SDK.

issues.title: com.google.api.grpc:proto-google-common-protos is not included in shaded SDK
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The proto-google-common-protos dependency used by StatusUtils is missing from the shaded SDK, causing NoClassDefFoundErrors or IncompatibleClassChangeErrors when converting status objects to/from exceptions.

issues.title: Test Server hanging or reporting completed on start update requests
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Test Server hangs or incorrectly reports workflow completion after update requests. The issue occurs inconsistently - hanging when using CDN-downloaded server, and falsely reporting completion when running locally.

issues.title: Failed Read-Only check should cause a WFT failure in an update validator, not fail the update
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Read-only check failures in update validators should cause a workflow task failure rather than failing the entire update. This issue was resolved by PR #1918.

issues.title: Verify DataConverters apply SerializationContext consistently
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Audit and verify that SerializationContext is applied consistently across all data conversion sites in the Java SDK, particularly in areas like memo fields during StartWorkflow calls where it may be missing.

issues.title: Identity not set on `Terminate` call
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The Terminate call in the Java SDK is not setting the identity field, which should be included for proper request identification and tracking.

issues.summary: Dependency vulnerability in snakeyaml-1.30.jar used by spring-boot-starter with 7 security issues including a critical remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2022-1471, CVSS 9.8).

issues.title: kotlin-klib-commonizer-embeddable-1.5.32.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 5.3)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Kotlin Standard Library 1.5.32 has a transitive dependency vulnerability (CVE-2022-24329) with CVSS score 5.3 affecting Multiplatform Gradle Projects. The issue allows dependency lock functionality to be bypassed in Kotlin projects. Automatic remediation is available by upgrading to version 1.6.0.

issues.title: Metric temporal_workflow_task_execution_failed is unexpectedly incremented on server-side task completion send failure
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The Java SDK increments the temporal_workflow_task_execution_failed metric on server-side task completion rejection (e.g., UNHANDLED_COMMAND), but this metric should only reflect worker-side failures. Unlike the Go SDK which logs these cases separately, Java needs to either stop incrementing in server-side rejection scenarios or introduce a label to differentiate worker-side failures from server-side rejections.

issues.title: Unable to build on Ubuntu Linux for aarch64 (ARM)
issues.author: uromahn
issues.summary: Build fails on Ubuntu Linux for aarch64 ARM architecture because the protoc executable being pulled is for macOS instead of Linux. The gradle build configuration needs to check both OS and architecture to select the correct protoc binary.

issues.title: Speculative workflow task can cause WFT failure
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Speculative workflow tasks can cause workflow task (WFT) failures in the Java SDK. When a speculative update is rejected and followed by a signal, the WFT may fail unexpectedly.

issues.title: WorkflowLocal shares initial value between all Workflows
issues.author: dano
issues.summary: WorkflowLocal instances created via withInitial() were being shared across different Workflows instead of creating unique instances per Workflow. This regression from v1.19.1 caused child workflows to access the same WorkflowLocal instance as their parent, breaking isolation.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment Workflow.getTypedSearchAttributes
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment returns null for typed search attributes that work correctly in production environments, indicating a test framework implementation gap.

issues.title: Enable TCP Keep alive by default
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Enable TCP Keep Alive by default in the Java SDK to improve connection stability and detect network failures more reliably.

issues.title: `UnableToAcquireLockException` exception causes slots to not get freed
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: When a workflow task times out with `UnableToAcquireLockException`, the worker slot is not released, causing resource leaks and preventing future tasks from executing on that slot.

issues.title: use spring boot sdk, how to run workflow
issues.author: starboyate
issues.summary: User asked how to run workflows using the temporal-spring-boot-starter-alpha. The question was redirected to documentation and community channels as it's not an SDK bug.

issues.title: Allow to get the retry policy set for execution from client via WorkflowInfo
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Request to expose the workflow retry policy set by the client through the WorkflowInfo API, allowing workflow code to inspect retry settings configured at invocation time.

issues.title: Null pointer exception on creating schedule with `TriggerImmediately` and no `Policy`
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Creating a schedule with TriggerImmediately and no policy set throws a null pointer exception instead of working as expected.

issues.title: Add start delay to start workflow options
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to add a start delay option to workflow start options in the Java SDK, allowing workflows to be scheduled to start at a future time.

issues.title: Support build ID reachability API
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to implement support for the Build ID reachability API in the Java SDK, as documented in the Temporal workers documentation.

issues.title: Worker can get stuck only polling sticky queue
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Worker can get stuck polling only the sticky task queue when empty responses or errors occur. The sticky queue backlog should be reset on empty/error responses (like Go SDK does), but Java SDK only resets on non-empty responses, causing workers to remain stuck polling the sticky queue if all pollers are exhausted.

issues.title: expose worker versioning via spring boot autoconfig
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Feature request to expose worker versioning configuration options through Spring Boot autoconfiguration, allowing developers to manage worker versions via properties/YAML files instead of programmatic configuration.

issues.title: Typed Search Attributes
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Request to implement typed search attributes for the Java SDK. This feature was already implemented in PR #1782 and this issue appears to be tracking or documenting that implementation.

issues.title: Fix WorkerOptions equals method
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: WorkerOptions.equals() throws NullPointerException when buildid is not explicitly set because the equals method lacks null checks for the buildid field.

issues.title: Exponential backoff for all server requests (including/especially poll)
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Discussion about whether the Java SDK implements exponential backoff for server polling requests. The author questions whether polling uses fixed intervals rather than exponential backoff, which could impact server load during high-traffic scenarios. A commenter clarifies that exponential backoff is already implemented via GrpcSyncRetryer and BackoffThrottler.

issues.title: Expose an async API to start a workflow which would allow mapping it to a Kotlin coroutine
issues.author: raghukiran
issues.summary: Request to expose an async API for starting workflows that integrates with Kotlin coroutines and dispatchers, allowing non-blocking workflow invocation from suspend functions.

issues.title: Typed search attributes aren't consistent with schedules
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Typed search attributes in Java SDK have incomplete integration with Schedule Workflows. The ScheduleOptions still uses the deprecated search attribute approach, and there are inconsistencies in how the SDK handles deprecated vs. typed search attributes when creating schedules, as well as panic conditions when describing schedules with incomplete metadata.

issues.title: Support different coroutine models in workflows and activities
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Enhancement request to support alternative concurrency models in the Java SDK: Kotlin coroutines (suspend functions) for workflows/activities, and virtual threads for Java 21+. Community is interested in first-class coroutine support to improve context propagation and ease of use in Kotlin.

issues.title: okhttp-4.10.0.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: The okhttp library (4.10.0) has a transitive dependency on okio-jvm-3.0.0 which contains CVE-2023-3635, a vulnerability in GzipSource that can cause denial of service when handling malformed gzip buffers. The issue requires upgrading okio-jvm to 3.4.0 or okhttp to 4.11.0.

issues.title: Spring Boot 3 native image support
issues.author: zhxnlai
issues.summary: Spring Boot 3 native image compilation fails due to missing `-parameters` compiler argument in Temporal Spring Boot autoconfigure classes. Constructor binding requires this flag for native image support.

issues.title: Add HealthIndicator to spring-boot library
issues.author: osialr
issues.summary: Request to add a Spring Boot HealthIndicator to the temporal-spring-boot-autoconfigure-alpha library to expose Temporal SDK connection and worker health status through the /health actuator endpoint.

issues.title: Update sdk-name and sdk-version in task-level metadata if changed
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add logic to update task-level SDK name and version metadata when these values change on the workflow, keeping them in sync with the client-name and client-version gRPC headers.

issues.title: Use Spring Boot ApplicationReadyEvent to start workers
issues.author: osialr
issues.summary: Users must manually call `applicationContext.start()` to begin workers, which is non-idiomatic Spring Boot and causes confusion. The request is to use Spring Boot's `ApplicationReadyEvent` to automatically start workers, eliminating boilerplate code in tests and main methods.

issues.title: Support for using Temporal Annotations as Meta Annotation
issues.author: madhur-spotnana
issues.summary: User requests support for using Temporal annotations (@ActivityInterface, @WorkflowInterface, @WorkflowMethod) as meta annotations in custom annotations, enabling declarative composition of annotation metadata similar to Spring Framework patterns.

issues.title: WorkflowReplayer throws unclear exception when LocalActivityOptions are misconfigured
issues.author: tylercunnion
issues.summary: WorkflowReplayer throws a cryptic exception when LocalActivityOptions are misconfigured, instead of providing a clear error message like it does for regular ActivityOptions. The underlying IllegalArgumentException from validateAndBuildWithDefaults is being swallowed by exception handling in CancellationScopeImpl.

issues.title: Support the certificate with linebreak strings from env variable
issues.author: masashinak
issues.summary: Environment variables containing certificate and private key strings cannot be properly loaded by ServiceStubOptionsTemplate because they use escaped newline sequences ("\n") instead of actual linebreaks. The template needs to handle conversion of escaped newlines to actual newlines when loading credentials from environment variables.

issues.title: Make ProtobufPayloadConverter and ProtobufJsonPayloadConverter not final
issues.author: stephenchen-humane
issues.summary: User requested to remove `final` modifiers from ProtobufPayloadConverter and ProtobufJsonPayloadConverter to allow direct extension and code reuse rather than extending AbstractProtobufPayloadConverter. The maintainer suggested using delegation/composition instead of inheritance.

issues.title: Have a config flag to disable temporal entirely with spring-boot-auto-configure-alpha
issues.author: stephenchen-humane
issues.summary: Feature request to add a configuration flag to disable Temporal bean instantiation in Spring Boot auto-configuration when Temporal is not used in certain service environments. Currently requires setting connection to 'local' to prevent errors.

issues.title: Exceptions thrown from ScheduleClient and ScheduleHandle should be wrapped in a TemporalException
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: ScheduleClient and ScheduleHandle throw exceptions that are not subclasses of TemporalException, violating the SDK's exception hierarchy contract where all SDK exceptions should extend TemporalException.

issues.title: RootScheduleClientInvoker.createSchedule swallows errors
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The RootScheduleClientInvoker.createSchedule method swallows exceptions that don't match ScheduleAlreadyRunningException, instead of rethrowing them. The catch clause needs to be more specific to only handle the intended exception type.

issues.title: SpringBoot - setting target to "local" does not register ServiceStubOptionsTemplate
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: When setting target to 'local' in Spring Boot configuration, ServiceStubOptionsTemplate is not registered, preventing metricsScope and other options from being applied to local service stubs.

issues.title: Spring support for ScheduleClient
issues.author: JonGilmore
issues.summary: Request to add Spring Boot autowiring support for ScheduleClient in the temporal-spring-boot-starter-alpha to simplify migration from legacy cron workflows to Schedules.

issues.title: SpringBoot - add @Primary to temporalWorkflowClient WorkflowClient Bean
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: SpringBoot autoconfig should annotate the default WorkflowClient bean with @Primary to allow autowiring without requiring @Qualifier when custom WorkflowClient beans are defined for different namespaces.

issues.title: DataConverter interface does not provide a default implementation for `failureToException` and `exceptionToFailure`
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The DataConverter interface is missing default implementations for `failureToException` and `exceptionToFailure` methods, breaking API compatibility when these methods are added to the interface.

issues.title: Add the possibility to run Temporal CLI server from test
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Request to add local Temporal CLI server support for testing in Java SDK, similar to TypeScript's TestWorkflowEnvironment.createLocal(). This would enable testing of features not available in the test environment, such as listWorkflowExecution.

issues.title: guava-31.1-jre.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.1)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Guava dependency 31.1-jre contains a security vulnerability (CVE-2023-2976) with CVSS score 7.1 that allows unauthorized file access via the default Java temporary directory. The fix involves upgrading to version 32.0.1 or later.

issues.title: [Test server] ConcurrentModificationException on Workflow.upsertSearchAttributes in tests
issues.author: sfc-gh-pjagielski
issues.summary: ConcurrentModificationException occurs when calling Workflow.upsertSearchAttributes in tests with concurrent workflows due to non-thread-safe HashMap in TestVisibilityStoreImpl. The fix requires changing to ConcurrentHashMap to handle child workflow concurrency.

issues.title: [Springboot] add support for multiple namespaces
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to add Spring Boot integration support for creating multiple Temporal clients and workers with different configurations, including support for different namespaces in the same application.

issues.title: Expose started time in activity info
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to expose the started time of an activity task in the activity info. This would allow activities to access timing information about when their execution began.

issues.title: Support for generic workflow failure handler via interceptor
issues.author: ddavidyuk
issues.summary: Feature request for a generic workflow failure handler via interceptor to detect when a workflow is about to fail and invoke an activity (e.g., send email, post to Kafka, alert). The request asks for a utility method to determine if an exception will fail the workflow based on WorkflowImplementationOptions.failWorkflowExceptionTypes.

issues.title: Add build id versioning feature support to test server
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add support for build ID versioning APIs (UpdateWorkerBuildIdCompatibility, GetWorkerBuildIdCompatibility, GetWorkerTaskReachability) to the test server to match the new worker versioning feature added to the SDK.

issues.title: Detailed message for exceptions
issues.author: yashwantakashlal
issues.summary: User requests a clearer exception message for WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted, which currently only contains workflow details but lacks explicit explanation that the workflow has already started. The request is to provide a more descriptive message that clarifies the condition while maintaining existing workflow detail information.

issues.title: Test server for linux_arm64 target
issues.author: wojked
issues.summary: User unable to run Temporal tests in Docker containers on M1/M2 Macs because the test server only provides amd64 binaries for Linux. Requests linux_arm64 builds to enable ARM64 container testing.

issues.title: Validate update protocol message type on replay
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Enhancement request to validate protocol message types during workflow replay for more accurate determinism coverage. Currently only ProtocolMessageCommand and Event are checked, but the generated protocol message should also be validated.

issues.title: Timeouts should be detected locally during activity execution
issues.author: jeffschoner
issues.summary: Activity timeouts are only detectable when heartbeats reach the Temporal server, but heartbeat throttling delays detection. The request proposes having the heartbeat method throw a timeout exception when start-to-close or schedule-to-close timeouts are violated, enabling local timeout detection.

issues.title: [Test Server] Support speculative workflow tasks for Update
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for speculative workflow tasks for Update in the Test Server when no command events were sent, no commands are in the response, or only rejected updates are present.

issues.title: spring-boot-autoconfigure-2.7.9.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Spring Boot AutoConfigure version 2.7.9 contains CVE-2023-20883, a high-severity (7.5 CVSS) denial-of-service vulnerability affecting Spring MVC with reverse proxy caches. The issue requires upgrading to version 2.7.12 or later.

issues.title: Log server-side task failure caused by invalid command in test server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The Java test server should log when task failures occur due to invalid commands (e.g., invalid search attributes) in TestWorkflowMutableStateImpl, rather than silently failing. Currently CommandVerifier.verifyCommand validates commands but doesn't log failures.

issues.title: Register Same Interface Multiple Times
issues.author: MrThreepwood
issues.summary: User wants to register the same workflow interface multiple times with different names in the Java SDK, similar to Go SDK's pattern. They're using a shared base class for trace creation and error handling across multiple test workflows but can't register it multiple times.

issues.title: Calling WorkflowLocal.set(null) results in the next call to WorkflowLocal.get() to throw a NullPointerException
issues.author: dano
issues.summary: WorkflowLocal.set(null) causes subsequent get() calls to throw NullPointerException because the Optional wrapper cannot distinguish between unset state and null values. Additionally, withInitial callbacks are re-invoked on each get() rather than being cached.

issues.title: Allow property placeholders in @ActivityImpl and @WorkflowImpl task queue name
issues.author: FrankShaw
issues.summary: Request to support Spring property placeholders in @WorkflowImpl and @ActivityImpl task queue names to enable dynamic queue configuration across different environments while maintaining worker auto-discovery.

issues.title: Making activity prefix and name generation pluggable
issues.author: osi
issues.summary: Feature request to make activity prefix and name generation pluggable rather than requiring repeated @ActivityInterface annotations. User references a TODO in the codebase and offers to contribute.

issues.title: Pass activity in init to ActivityInboundCallInterceptor
issues.author: vaclavbroz
issues.summary: Request to pass the activity implementation object to ActivityInboundCallInterceptor's init method to enable reflection-based analysis of activity annotations. This would allow interceptors to apply behavior based on activity metadata without maintaining separate references.

issues.title: Run update validators in a limited workflow context
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to run update validators in a limited workflow context where they have access to workflow info but cannot execute APIs that produce commands.

issues.title: Add capability and SDK metadata field for test server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for SDK and capability metadata fields in the test server to align with API pull requests #259 and #263. Requires determining how TestServer should return sensible values coherent with the current SDK version.

issues.title: Support sync update request
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for sending synchronous update requests to external workflows from the Java SDK client.

issues.title: Write ProtocolMessageCommand along with protocol messages
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add ProtocolMessageCommand support to Java SDK when sending protocol messages during WorkflowTaskComplete. This enables proper non-determinism validation for workflow updates, which was previously difficult without this command.

issues.title: Support Async Update Polling
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for asynchronous update polling in the Java SDK, aligning with similar functionality implemented in the Go SDK.

issues.title: Add support for workflow update to Test Server
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for workflow update protocol and messages to the Test Server, enabling testing of workflow update functionality.

issues.title: Workflow Update: Java
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for workflow updates to the Java SDK, allowing users to issue update requests to workflows, have them process the update while accessing and mutating internal state, and return responses to callers. This functionality will be available from external workflows and external code.

issues.title: spring-boot-dependencies-2.7.9.pom: 2 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 6.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Spring Expression Language (SpEL) vulnerability in transitive dependency spring-expression-5.3.25.jar affecting the temporal-spring-boot-starter-alpha module. Two CVEs (CVE-2023-20861 and CVE-2023-20863) with CVSS 6.5 severity allow denial-of-service attacks through specially crafted SpEL expressions.

issues.title: Workflow Task Exception eats up the exception sent by code
issues.author: hrishirc
issues.summary: After calling getVersion() in a workflow, business logic exceptions thrown immediately after are being suppressed instead of propagating to the Temporal UI. The workflow task appears to be consuming the exception.

issues.title: Add attempt to MDC context of the activity worker handler
issues.author: rp-julienguery
issues.summary: Request to add activity attempt number to MDC context in the Java SDK's activity worker handler to differentiate between retry attempts in logs.

issues.title: Jackson serialization issue when activity returns s3 object as response.
issues.author: poshak-greytip
issues.summary: User attempted to return an AWS S3Object from an activity, but Jackson serialization failed because S3Object contains non-serializable stream objects. The issue was closed as wontfix with guidance that users must implement custom serialization for complex objects.

issues.title: inconsistency on MaximumAttempts attribute between local activities and "normal" activities
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Local activities do not retry when MaximumAttempts is set to 0, while regular activities retry forever with the same setting. This creates inconsistent behavior between local and normal activities.

issues.title: temporal-testing-1.20.0-SNAPSHOT: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Transitive dependency json-smart-2.4.8 contains CVE-2023-1370, a stack exhaustion vulnerability (CVSS 7.5) triggered by deeply nested JSON arrays/objects. The vulnerability affects temporal-testing through the json-path dependency chain.

issues.title: Signal with a local activity in the last Workflow Task hangs the workflow execution
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: When a workflow receives a signal in the final workflow task that starts a local activity, the workflow hangs with an INVALID_ARGUMENT error due to improper command sequencing. The CompleteWorkflowExecution command is issued before RecordMarker commands from the signal's local activity, violating the requirement that CompleteWorkflowExecution must be the last command.

issues.title: temporal-testing-1.19.0-SNAPSHOT: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Transitive dependency vulnerability in json-smart-2.4.8 (CVE-2023-1370) affects temporal-testing due to stack exhaustion risk from uncontrolled JSON nesting. The vulnerability was automatically resolved when the vulnerable library was removed from the dependency tree.

issues.title: json-path-2.7.0.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Dependency vulnerability in json-smart-2.4.7.jar (transitive dependency via json-path-2.7.0) causes potential denial of service through stack exhaustion when parsing deeply nested JSON structures. Fixed by upgrading json-smart to 2.4.9 or json-path to 2.8.0.

issues.title: WorkerOptions should enforce an amount of executors to be not less than an amount of pollers
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkerOptions configuration allows invalid executor counts that prevent proper queue polling. The maxConcurrentWorkflowTaskExecutionSize setting can be set lower than the minimum required executors (2: one for sticky queue, one for main queue), causing worker initialization failures.

issues.title: Test server not accessible
issues.author: cv65kr
issues.summary: Test server fails with ExceptionInInitializerError during startup when reflection code for ActivityTaskHandlers is out of sync with actual method signatures, causing the test server to crash when attempting to start workflow execution.

issues.title: Start of child workflow from a cancelled workflow context needs test code coverage
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Child workflows started from already-cancelled workflow contexts lack unit test coverage. The code path at SyncWorkflowContext.java:586 needs tests to verify proper behavior when initiating child workflows during cancellation.

issues.title: Test Code Coverage
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Epic for tracking test code coverage gaps in critical sections of the Java SDK. The epic was closed as the team decided against using GitHub issues as epics.

issues.title: Cancellation of external workflow needs test coverage
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The external workflow cancellation API (ExternalWorkflowStub#cancel and SyncWorkflowContext#cancelWorkflow) lacks unit test coverage. This request is to add comprehensive tests for the user-facing external workflow cancellation functionality.

issues.title: Synchronous workflow update
issues.author: manuver-khan
issues.summary: Feature request to implement synchronous workflow updates in the Java SDK, based on the corresponding feature added to the Temporal server (PR #3822). This enables workflows to be updated synchronously during execution.

issues.title: ServiceWorkflowHistoryIterator should eagerly request the next page
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: ServiceWorkflowHistoryIterator should eagerly request the next page of workflow history instead of waiting until the current page is fully processed, improving performance for long workflow replays by reducing blocking time.

issues.title: WorkerFactoryOptions getDefaultInstance() does not return the default instance
issues.author: cherry-lim
issues.summary: WorkerFactoryOptions.getDefaultInstance() doesn't return an instance with actual default values populated. Users expected the method to return an object with all default configuration values set, but instead it returns an instance requiring manual merging of properties from different sources.

issues.title: spring-boot-starter-2.7.9.jar: 7 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 9.8) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Spring Boot starter 2.7.9 contains 7 vulnerabilities in SnakeYAML 1.30, including a critical RCE vulnerability (CVE-2022-1471) with CVSS score 9.8. The issue was automatically closed after the vulnerable dependency was removed or ignored.

issues.title: WorkflowImplementationOptions.FailWorkflowExceptionTypes ignored for service failures
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: WorkflowImplementationOptions.FailWorkflowExceptionTypes is ignored when the service rejects workflow task completion, causing workflows to get stuck in retry loops instead of failing as expected. Setting an invalid retry policy (e.g., maximumInterval < initialInterval) demonstrates the issue where service failures don't trigger workflow failure.

issues.title: Make Serialization Context available for PayloadCodecs and PayloadConverters
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Users need access to serialization context (workflow ID, activity ID, task queue names) in PayloadConverter and PayloadCodec implementations. This enables use cases like task-queue-specific data conversion and incorporating workflow context into encryption codecs.

issues.title: Support listWorkflowExecutions in test server
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Test server lacks support for listWorkflowExecutions API endpoint, forcing users to use separate listOpenWorkflowExecutions and listClosedWorkflowExecutions endpoints instead. This is a gap since all SDKs now provide high-level APIs for listing workflows that rely on the unified endpoint.

issues.title: Implement workflow_start_delay in test server
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement the workflow_start_delay feature in the test server to support delayed workflow start times for testing purposes, following the API specification defined in temporalio/api PR #264.

issues.title: Add API to count workflows
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to add an API to count workflows in the Java SDK. This is a reference to a parent issue that specifies the requirements for implementing workflow count functionality.

issues.title: Closing metric subscopes surprisingly closes the parent scope as well
issues.author: tylercunnion
issues.summary: Closing a metric subscope created with .tagged() or .subscope() unexpectedly closes the parent worker's metrics scope, disabling all metrics reporting. This is caused by subscopes closing their underlying reporter through the Uber Tally library dependency.

issues.title: Add support for TerminateIfRunning WorkflowIdReusePolicy in Test Server
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Test Server does not respect the WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_TERMINATE_IF_RUNNING WorkflowIdReusePolicy. When this policy is set, the Test Server should terminate any running workflow with the same ID and create a new one, but currently it does not.

issues.title: Exceptions thrown from workflow executor code shouldn't be subject to failWorkflowExceptionTypes
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Exceptions thrown from workflow executor/control code are currently subject to failWorkflowExceptionTypes logic, which can cause internal SDK errors (like outdated cached instance detection) to fail workflow executions instead of just failing workflow tasks. The request is to exclude control code exceptions from user-configured exception type filters, with an exception for NonDeterministicException.

issues.title: Improve shutdown of workers with wait for releasing of all reserved local dispatch slots
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Improve graceful worker shutdown to wait for all reserved local dispatch slots (from eager activities and eager workflow tasks) to be released before completing shutdown.

issues.title: Child WF fails on signaling a 'not found' WF although the signal was handled
issues.author: shaharco
issues.summary: Child workflow fails with SIGNAL_EXTERNAL_WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_NOT_FOUND error even though the signal was successfully handled by the parent workflow, suggesting a race condition in signal delivery timing.

issues.title: LongLocalActivityFailsWhileHeartbeatingMeteringTest flakes in codecoverage runs
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: LongLocalActivityFailsWhileHeartbeatingMeteringTest flakes intermittently during code coverage runs, producing unexpected metering counts [0, 3, 3, 2] instead of expected [0, 2, 3, 1].

issues.title: New Failure types
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Epic to introduce new failure types to the Failures structure to better express various failure scenarios in the Java SDK.

issues.title: Inheritance with @WorkflowMethod annotation
issues.author: Bennett-Lynch
issues.summary: User requests that the @WorkflowMethod annotation be discoverable through inheritance from parent classes/interfaces to enable code reuse in workflow patterns without redundant re-declaration.

issues.title: Subsequent MutableSideEffect calls inside one Workflow Task may explode with non-determinism on replay
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Subsequent MutableSideEffect calls with the same ID within a single workflow task can cause non-deterministic replay errors. When multiple calls produce different results, only some markers are recorded in history, causing markers to be misaligned to wrong calls on replay.

issues.title: WorkflowStub.getExecution returns null on Temporal Java SDK 1.18.1 when workflow is started via signalWithStart
issues.author: ddavidyuk
issues.summary: WorkflowStub.getExecution() returns null after workflows are started via signalWithStart() in SDK 1.18.1, breaking unit tests that relied on this behavior in previous versions.

issues.title: Schedule API example with Spring boot
issues.author: smaldored
issues.summary: User requests a high-level Schedule API example for Java SDK with Spring Boot integration. The feature is being tracked and was eventually delivered with a sample in the samples repository.

issues.title: Utilize Signal requestId field for signal gRPC retries deduplication
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Implement signal request deduplication by utilizing the SignalWorkflowExecutionRequest#request_id field in the Java SDK. This allows the SDK to deduplicate signal retry attempts that experience gRPC errors but still arrive at the Server.

issues.title: Workers not auto starting in spring boot starter
issues.author: sidguptajhs
issues.summary: Workers fail to auto-start in Spring Boot starter version 1.18.1 when using the start-workers flag, causing workflows to time out with no error logs. The issue was resolved by requiring explicit ConfigurableApplicationContext.start() call in applications.

issues.title: Allow WorkflowImplementationOptions to be set via config for Spring Boot
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Request to allow WorkflowImplementationOptions to be configured via Spring Boot configuration instead of only programmatically. This feature would improve Spring Boot integration by enabling declarative workflow option setup.

issues.title: Eager Workflow Task Dispatch
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowClient should request eager workflow task dispatch from the Server when starting workflows or signaling workflows on local workers listening to the correct task queue, to improve performance and latency.

issues.title: ContextPropagator redesign
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: ContextPropagator lacks access to workflow/activity instances and awareness of context type, preventing proper ThreadLocal/WorkflowLocal usage and lifecycle management. A redesign is needed to reimplement it as Interceptors with proper integration into the SDK's context propagation model.

issues.title: Add history pagination to Test Server
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Test Server currently returns all history in a single response without pagination. This prevents SDK developers from testing pagination-dependent behavior. The request is to add configurable pagination to the Test Server for improved test coverage.

issues.title: Workers with java-sdk 1.18.0 experience "required property congestionInitialInterval not set"
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Workers with java-sdk 1.18.0+ fail with 'required property congestionInitialInterval not set' when processing workflows requiring pagination to fetch history, causing stuck workflows unable to complete replay.

issues.title: Add support for interceptor beans to Spring Boot
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Users need the ability to register interceptor beans in the Spring Boot context so that these interceptors can be automatically applied to Workers and Client configuration.

issues.title: Allow WorkflowImplementationOptions to be passed in TestWorkflowExtension->setWorkflowTypes
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: TestWorkflowExtension lacks the ability to pass WorkflowImplementationOptions to setWorkflowTypes, unlike TestWorkflowRule which supports this. Users must use workarounds like calling registerWorkflowImplementationTypes directly instead of using the convenient setWorkflowTypes method.

issues.title: Allow setting *additional* memo values in ContinueAsNewOptions
issues.author: natthu-stripe
issues.summary: Request to add an `addMemo()` method to ContinueAsNewOptions.Builder that allows appending memo values to the next workflow execution without requiring access to the current execution's entire memo map. Currently users must extract all existing memo values before setting new ones when continuing a workflow.

issues.title: Support for Spring Boot 3.0 in integration
issues.author: jrogers
issues.summary: Temporal Spring Boot Integration is incompatible with Spring Boot 3.0 due to removal of spring.factories for auto-configuration. Support needs to be added with necessary changes while considering backwards compatibility with earlier versions.

issues.title: Test server with child workflow and signal is timing out when attemping unlock-with-sleep
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Test server with child workflow and signal is timing out when attempting unlock-with-sleep. When a parent workflow starts a child workflow and both wait on signals, time-skipping test failures occur during unlock operations.

issues.title: TemporalFailure thrown from Signal method should fail Workflow Execution
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: TemporalFailure exceptions thrown from signal methods should fail the workflow execution instead of failing only the workflow task, which can cause infinite retry loops. Currently, failures in signal handlers are not treated the same as failures in workflow methods.

issues.title: spring-boot-dependencies-2.7.8.pom: 7 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 9.8) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Seven vulnerabilities were identified in snakeyaml-1.30.jar (transitive dependency via spring-boot-dependencies-2.7.8), with the highest severity being 9.8. The most critical vulnerability (CVE-2022-1471) allows remote code execution through unsafe YAML deserialization.

issues.title: error_prone_core-2.18.0.jar: 3 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: error_prone_core dependency transitively includes protobuf-java-3.19.2 with 3 high-severity vulnerabilities (CVE-2022-3510, CVE-2022-3509, CVE-2022-3171) that can cause denial of service through parsing attacks. The issue was resolved by noting this is a compile-time only dependency not included in runtime.

issues.title: Query on a stub used to start a workflow unexpectedly targets only the first run
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowStub queries incorrectly target only the first workflow run after the stub is used to start a workflow, instead of following the ContinueAsNew chain and targeting the latest run as expected.

issues.title: issue - when   @Autowired spring cloud open feign client bean into  bean with @ActivityImpl @Component, this.workerFactory.start(); gonna start workers so that could not auto register other workers
issues.author: jack-yu-matrix
issues.summary: Spring Boot autoconfiguration prematurely starts WorkerFactory when a Spring Cloud OpenFeign client bean is autowired into an ActivityImpl component, preventing auto-registration of additional workers.

issues.title: issue - when   @Autowired other bean into  bean with @ActivityImpl @Component, this.workerFactory.start(); gonna start workers so that could not auto register other workers
issues.author: jack-yu-matrix
issues.summary: When @Autowired beans are injected into a bean with @ActivityImpl @Component, the workerFactory.start() is called prematurely, preventing other workers from being auto-registered.

issues.title: workflow_completed counter counts successful completions of workflow method instead of workflow executions
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The workflow_completed metric counter incorrectly counts successful completions of workflow methods (including replays) instead of actual workflow executions. The same issue affects workflow_continue_as_new and workflow_failed counters.

issues.title: error_prone_core-2.17.0.jar: 3 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Three high-severity vulnerabilities (CVE-2022-3510, CVE-2022-3509, CVE-2022-3171) identified in protobuf-java 3.19.2, a transitive dependency of error_prone_core. All three CVEs have CVSS scores of 7.5 and affect denial of service resilience through parsing issues with Protocol Buffer messages.

issues.title: Fix javadoc for ActivityExecutionContext.getHeartbeatDetails and consider adding getLastHeartbeatDetails
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The javadoc for ActivityExecutionContext.getHeartbeatDetails is inaccurateit states the method extracts details from the last failed attempt, but it actually returns updated details on each heartbeat call. Additionally, a new getLastHeartbeatDetails method should be added to match other SDKs and provide access to heartbeat details without automatic updates.

issues.title: Opt-in to having stack trace query use custom data converter
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add a worker option allowing the custom data converter to be used for __stack_trace queries instead of always using the default converter.

issues.title: Do not auto-retry gRPC-message-size-too-large errors
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The gRPC interceptor automatically retries ResourceExhausted errors, but should not retry the specific case where a message exceeds the 4MB size limit. Currently, message-too-large errors are retried unnecessarily and should either be prevented before transmission or handled specially to fail the workflow task immediately.

issues.title: ExternalWorkflowStub query
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Request to add query capability to ExternalWorkflowStub, currently only supporting signals. This requires new command and server-side implementation support.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Improving replay issue for Timers
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Timers create non-deterministic execution history when duration is <=0 or >0, causing workflow replay issues. Users need validation checks to prevent this non-deterministic behavior.

issues.title: Test server seems to not enable time skipping in this specific scenario
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Time skipping in TestWorkflowEnvironment fails to advance time for workflows started via signalWithStart when called from an activity. The timer in the second workflow (W2) doesn't complete immediately despite time skipping being enabled.

issues.title: spring-boot-starter-2.7.6.jar: 7 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 9.8) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Spring Boot Starter 2.7.6 contains 7 vulnerabilities in the transitive SnakeYAML 1.30 dependency, including a critical remote code execution flaw (CVE-2022-1471 with CVSS 9.8). Most vulnerabilities have fixes available in Spring Boot 3.0.0, but one (CVE-2022-1471) has no direct fix path.

issues.title: Local Activity Execution should stop making attempts if Workflow Task or subsequent heartbeat fails
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Local Activity Execution continues making retry attempts even after the parent Workflow Task fails, potentially causing orphaned activities to retry indefinitely if no scheduleToClose timeout is set or it's very long.

issues.title: Please return OriginalExecutionRunID in Workflow info
issues.author: lexi-indeed
issues.summary: User requests that OriginalExecutionRunID be included in the Workflow info returned by the SDK. Currently, this field is not accessible through searchable attributes or the workflow info API.

issues.title: Unregistered Local Activity should fail Workflow Task
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Unregistered local activities should fail the workflow task instead of failing at activity execution time. This ensures that missing local activity registrations are caught early during workflow execution rather than at the activity execution stage.

issues.title: kotlin-stdlib-jdk8-1.4.32.jar: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 5.3)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Kotlin Standard Library version 1.4.32 contains CVE-2022-24329, a medium severity (CVSS 5.3) vulnerability related to dependency locking in Multiplatform Gradle Projects. The vulnerability is in a transitive dependency and can be fixed by upgrading to Kotlin 1.6.0 or later.

issues.title: Issue with ReplayAwareLogger and CanceledFailure
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: ReplayAwareLogger incorrectly identifies workflow as replaying when handling ActivityFailure with CanceledFailure cause, causing incorrect logging behavior and breaking mutableSideEffect calls in detached CancellationScopes.

issues.title: Return not-found with `NamespaceNotFoundFailure` when namespace not found (and other errordetails)
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to return NamespaceNotFoundFailure error details when DescribeNamespace is called for an unknown namespace, and support other missing error details from the Temporal API.

issues.title: FailureConverter API
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add public FailureConverter API to allow customizing error-to-failure conversion with support for encrypting failure attributes like message and stack trace. This API was already implemented in the other 3 major SDKs.

issues.title: High level API to list workflows
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add a high-level API to WorkflowClient for listing workflows and fetching their execution histories. This feature is needed for the SDK's safe rollout capability and should provide user-friendly access to workflow listings with optional concurrency support for history fetching.

issues.title: Error while implementing Inheritance | Java SDK
issues.author: jeenadeepak
issues.summary: User encounters error when implementing generic workflow interfaces with inheritance. The SDK throws a "multiple signal method found" error when creating workflow stubs for implementations that inherit from a generic TranslationWorkflow interface with type parameters.

issues.title: Dynamic & interpolated taskQueues
issues.author: karneyli
issues.summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration doesn't support dynamic or interpolated task queues. Users need the ability to set task queues programmatically or through property resolution in the WorkersTemplate, similar to how activities can be registered to multiple queues in samples.

issues.title: Metric scope for workflow instance should ignore metrics written after a destruction of the instance is requested
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Workflow MetricScope should prevent metric reporting after instance destruction is requested, avoiding double-reporting in finally blocks during workflow eviction due to DestroyWorkflowThreadError.

issues.title: TLS server for java sdk connection option.
issues.author: XingLiu0923
issues.summary: User requests a way to configure TLS server settings for Java SDK connections, similar to the Go SDK's ConnectionOptions. They need to connect through a TLS server to obtain certificates before connecting to the Temporal cluster.

issues.title: Test service time skipping broken in a child workflow
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Time skipping in child workflows doesn't work when a parent workflow uses continue-as-new. The test service fails to skip time for Workflow.sleep calls in child workflows after the parent continues as new.

issues.title: Test service continue-as-new implementation is not atomic
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The test server's continue-as-new implementation is not atomic, causing signals sent to a workflow executing continue-as-new to be rejected with NOT_FOUND errors instead of being reliably delivered.

issues.title: Activity stub throws IllegalArgumentException from toString method
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity stub throws IllegalArgumentException when toString() is called, as the method invocation handler doesn't recognize Object methods that aren't defined in the activity interface. The same issue affects workflow stubs.

issues.title: Improve diagnostic message printed by TestWorkflowRule on timeout.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: TestWorkflowRule timeout diagnostics need improvement to include DescribeWorkflowExecution results, stack traces for open workflows, and better formatting to help troubleshoot stuck tests.

issues.title: Error in a local activity should fail the WorkflowTask instead of failing an activity execution
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Local activities that throw Java Errors fail with RETRY_STATE_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR instead of immediately failing the WorkflowTask. Errors should signal worker problems and cause workflow task failure rather than activity execution failure.

issues.title: io.temporal.api is not included in the distributed javadoc.jar for temporal-serviceclient
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: The javadoc.jar artifact for temporal-serviceclient does not include documentation for classes in the io.temporal.api package, even though the compiled jar contains these classes. Users need complete javadoc coverage across all packages.

issues.title: Declaring ActivityStub using annotation instead of newActivityStub
issues.author: s-aliasgar
issues.summary: Feature request to support declaring ActivityStub instances using Spring annotations instead of requiring manual Workflow.newActivityStub() calls. This would integrate with Temporal-Springboot-alpha to enable declarative activity stub configuration with retry options.

issues.title: How to gracefully shut down a temporal worker
issues.author: sherifr212
issues.summary: User asks how to gracefully shut down a Temporal worker in Java SDK without data loss or corruption, and whether steps/tasks can be re-executed.

issues.title: Add num_pollers metric
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to add a num_pollers gauge metric to track the number of concurrent active activity and workflow pollers, as implemented in the Core SDK. This metric is needed to monitor poller activity separately for different poller types.

issues.title: Multiple tests launched from test class with mocked activity method fail, but each when launch separately passes
issues.author: idkomarov
