issues.summary: Feature request to allow registering new search attributes directly through the Java SDK instead of requiring manual registration via tctl commands on Elasticsearch.

issues.title: Legacy query path leads to thread leaks in case of state machine exceptions
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Thread pool exhaustion in the legacy query path causes thread leaks when worker or state machine exceptions occur, particularly with RejectedExecutionException when the thread pool reaches capacity.

issues.title: Implement autoscaling of Pollers
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Temporal Java SDK currently uses hardcoded magic numbers (5 activity pollers, 2 workflow pollers) that users must manually adjust. This feature request proposes implementing automatic autoscaling of pollers based on the actual load profile of executors and pollers.

issues.title: Deadlock during activity state machine cancelation
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Deadlock occurs during activity state machine cancelation when a cancellation scope cancels an async activity and forces a workflow end. The activity state machine triggers an event loop on a workflow thread that has already completed, causing a potential deadlock exception.

issues.title: Add init method to workflow
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Add an init method to workflows that executes before any signal, query, or workflow method is processed, with access to workflow input parameters. This is essential for Dynamic Workflows where signals can arrive before workflow code execution, and for handling initialization that depends on workflow parameters.

issues.title: Improve documentation for Signal Methods
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Documentation needs clarification that signal methods can be called before the workflow method when a workflow is reset to the first workflow task. Signal methods, query code, and workflow code should not assume ordering of execution.

issues.title: Internal error in gRPC channel of WorkflowServiceStubs
issues.author: smax48
issues.summary: After long periods of inactivity (~40 min), WorkflowServiceStubs encounters an internal gRPC error ('INTERNAL: Panic! This is a bug!') caused by a race condition between gRPC's idle timer and Temporal's connection reset mechanism, rendering the channel unusable.

issues.title: Make tracing tags consistent across SDKs
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Tracing tags are inconsistent across Temporal SDKs. This feature request aims to standardize tracing tags to provide a consistent observability experience across all SDK implementations (Java, Go, TypeScript, and others).

issues.title: Passing too large blob as an Activity input ends with non-descriptive gRPC error
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: When passing a blob larger than the server limit as an activity input, users receive a non-descriptive gRPC error about a closed stream instead of a clear server error message and clean activity failure.

issues.title: Expose SignalExternalWorkflowExecutionCommandAttributes.ChildWorkflowOnly in SDK API
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The SignalExternalWorkflowExecutionCommandAttributes.ChildWorkflowOnly flag is not exposed in the Java SDK API or signal interceptors, unlike the Go and TypeScript SDKs. This feature request seeks to expose this flag for parity across SDKs and support external workflow signaling to child workflows only.

issues.title: WorkflowClient#execute doesn't pair correctly with workflowStub.getResult()
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowClient.execute() doesn't properly synchronize with workflowStub.getResult(), causing tests to hang. The issue occurs when calling getResult() immediately after execute() without intermediate operations like sleep() or waiting on the returned future.

issues.title: Allow more granular setting of QueryRejectCondition
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Users need granular control over QueryRejectCondition settings. Currently, QueryRejectCondition can only be specified globally at the WorkflowClientOptions level, affecting all queries from that client. This request seeks the ability to configure rejection conditions per query or per workflow stub.

issues.title: Document gRPC retrying logic and parameters across SDKs and normalize the approach
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Document and normalize gRPC retry logic, deadlines, and parameters across all SDKs. Each SDK currently has different implementations with varying default values, timeout handling, jitter, and retry behaviors that need to be unified.

issues.title: Logging
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Epic tracking improvements to reduce verbosity and misleading error logs in Temporal SDK, and provide users with flexibility to configure logging of errors and exceptions from their code execution.

issues.title: testCronWorkflowWithIncrementSchedule fails
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: A cron workflow test fails with an assertion error where the expected count is 4 but the actual count is 3, indicating an issue with cron scheduling or execution counting.

issues.title: OpenTracing doesn't work correctly with continueAsNew
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: OpenTracing span becomes disconnected when continueAsNew is used. The continueAsNew interception and header handling doesn't correctly propagate tracing context in the Java SDK.

issues.title: Test env - ListOpenWorkflowExecutionsResponse exec status is always WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: When listing open workflow executions in test environment using TestWorkflowRule, the execution status is always WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED instead of the expected WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_STATUS_RUNNING.

issues.title: Add "listQueries" built-in query
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to add a built-in 'listQueries' query to the Java SDK for listing available queries in a workflow.

issues.title: WorkflowExecutionUtils fails reading history jsons produced by newer protocol versions
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionUtils fails to deserialize history JSONs produced by newer protocol versions with added fields. Proto allows adding fields for backwards compatibility, but the current implementation throws errors on unknown fields.

issues.title: Workflow search queries APIs
issues.author: akdoan1
issues.summary: Request to add workflow search query APIs to the Java SDK, similar to Go's ListOpenWorkflow capability. The issue discusses whether to expose elasticsearch search functionality and administrative APIs through the SDK client.

issues.title: Cleanup and normalization of interfaces of *Option classes
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Builder classes for *Option need refactoring to move validation logic from validateBuildWithDefaults to standard build method, and normalize validation patterns across all Option classes which currently have inconsistent validation strategies.

issues.title: NullPointer in RetryOptions#merge
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: NullPointerException occurs in RetryOptions#merge when attempting to merge non-primitive Duration values. The merge method fails to properly handle null Duration parameters.

issues.title: testUntypedChildStubWorkflowAsyncInvoke flake with in-memory service
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Test flake in testUntypedChildStubWorkflowAsyncInvoke when using in-memory test service. This appears to be related to issue #814 and suggests a common underlying problem with the test framework or in-memory service implementation.

issues.title: Expose health check on WorkflowServiceStubs or WorkflowClient
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Request to expose a health check method on WorkflowServiceStubs or WorkflowClient to allow users to verify the underlying channel/connection to the Temporal server is healthy. This is a cross-SDK feature request with similar issues filed for Go and Node.js SDKs.

issues.title: Provide a recommended way to pass configuration into workflow
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Request for a recommended approach to pass configuration into workflow instances while maintaining determinism. Proposes using interceptors and side effects to store and access configuration.

issues.title: Automatically supply binaryChecksum
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: SDK worker should automatically supply binary checksum (hash of worker image) to workflow task completion calls instead of requiring users to provide it or leaving it empty.

issues.title: `Workflow.await(duration, condition)` doesn't work correctly with workflow cancelation
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Workflow.await(duration, condition) doesn't properly handle workflow cancellation, throwing CanceledFailure but then causing a "closed" error. WorkflowStub.getResult() also fails to return when await has a duration, unlike the working await(condition) variant.

issues.title: [Port] Allow multiple host:port to be specified for connection
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Port Go SDK's DNS-based approach for distributing connections across multiple frontend servers. The original feature request sought to allow multiple host:port specifications and distribute pollers across multiple connections for better load distribution.

issues.title: testUntypedChildStubWorkflowAsync flaked in CI with test service internal state machine exception
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Test `testUntypedChildStubWorkflowAsync` flaked in CI due to a test service internal state machine exception. This appears related to issue #830 and was resolved through PR #1289.

issues.title: Add test framework for partial json history replay and continuing of execution
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Request to add a test framework capability for replaying partial JSON workflow history and continuing execution to simulate failure recovery and worker cache eviction scenarios. Currently supported for state machines testing but missing from workflow integration testing framework.

issues.title: Workflow.retry that takes a function to decide if retry is needed
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request for Workflow.retry to accept a predicate function that can execute custom logic to decide if a retry is needed, rather than relying only on string matching of exception types in doNotRetry list.

issues.title: whenStickyIsEnabledThenTheWorkflowIsCachedChildWorkflows flakes with Dockerized service
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: StickyWorkerTest#whenStickyIsEnabledThenTheWorkflowIsCachedChildWorkflows test flakes intermittently when running with Dockerized Temporal service in CI/CD pipeline.

issues.title: activity_endtoend_latency is a latency of one activity run instead of the whole sequence of retries
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The activity_endtoend_latency metric measures the latency of a single activity execution attempt rather than the total time from start to successful completion across all retries. This causes the metric to misrepresent the actual end-to-end latency experienced by users.

issues.title: Context propagation is not invoked when a workflow start and is configured using WorkflowClientOptions
issues.author: jrpedrianes
issues.summary: Context propagators configured at WorkflowClient level are not being invoked when starting workflows. Users must configure them on WorkflowOptions instead, but should be able to set them once at the client level and have them applied to all workflow stubs created from that client.

issues.title: Report replay metrics
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Java SDK lacks metrics reporting for workflow replays. Currently, replay completions are not reported in metrics, limiting visibility into replay behavior and anomalies during replay execution.

issues.title: IdentityInPendingActivityTest#testPendingActivityHasIdentity flakes for both in-memory and dockerized server
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: IdentityInPendingActivityTest#testPendingActivityHasIdentity flakes intermittently in both in-memory and dockerized server environments during CI builds.

issues.title: DescribeTest#testSuccessfulActivity fails with Docker
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: Test `testSuccessfulActivity` in DescribeTest fails when running with Docker, likely due to changes from merging a pull request to the Test Service.

issues.title: History produced by test environment should be compliant with tctl history format
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Test environment history output is not compliant with tctl format, preventing generated histories from being used directly in the replayer. The test framework needs to produce tctl-compatible history for proper replay testing.

issues.title: Performance & Threading model
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Epic to improve the Java SDK's threading model by reducing thread churn through pooling, event loops, or work-stealing mechanisms to minimize resource overhead and enable better resource management for individual workflows.

issues.title: Worker identity should be reported and recorded when worker picks up an Activity task
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Worker identity should be reported when a worker picks up an activity task to populate the lastWorkerIdentity field in PendingActivityTask. Currently this field remains empty because the server expects the identity to be sent at task pickup, not during heartbeat.

issues.title: Tests checking worker identity are failing with docker-compose Temporal server
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Worker identity is not being included in describeWorkflow results and recordActivityTaskHeartbeatById calls when using a dockerized Temporal server, causing tests that verify worker identity to fail.

issues.title: AuthorizationGrpcMetadataProvider doesn't have a public constructor
issues.author: jrpedrianes
issues.summary: AuthorizationGrpcMetadataProvider class lacks a public constructor, making it impossible to instantiate outside its package. Users must either extend the class or wait for a future fix.

issues.title: Add an ability to create WorkflowStub from workflowInterface
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Add a convenience method to create untyped WorkflowStub directly from a workflow interface and workflowId, without needing to first create a typed stub and then convert it. This addresses a common use case of needing an untyped stub for sending signals or queries.

issues.title: Implement Workflow Tasks backpressure for Pollers if there is no available executors
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Workflow Task pollers should implement backpressure by pausing polling when no executor threads are available, rather than continuously polling and causing task backlog. This prevents configuration imbalances between pollers and executors from creating significant delays.

issues.title: Querying a completed workflow increments "temporal_workflow_completed_total" metrics counter
issues.author: HaakonRav
issues.summary: Querying a completed workflow incorrectly increments the 'temporal_workflow_completed_total' metrics counter, treating query operations as new workflow completions. This causes inaccurate metrics reporting where the counter increases with each query request rather than reflecting actual workflow completions.

issues.title: AbandonOnCancelActivityTest flake
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: AbandonOnCancelActivityTest flakes in build pipelines due to a NullPointerException in the test activity implementation, causing intermittent test failures.

issues.title: Offer ActivityOptions via Supplier to support dynamic configs
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Request to support dynamic activity timeout configuration via a Supplier<ActivityOptions> instead of requiring application redeployment. This would allow workers to update activity timeouts on a faster cycle in response to incidents without rebuilding and restarting the entire application.

issues.title: Revisit ActivityExecutionContext and ActivityCompletion clients
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Refactoring epic to improve code quality and maintainability of ActivityExecutionContext, ActivityCompletionClient, and ManualActivityCompletionClient. Addresses inconsistent error handling, missing documentation, and heartbeat behavior issues across these activity lifecycle components.

issues.title: TestEnvironmentOptions.Builder.validateAndBuildWithDefaults fails
issues.author: smax48
issues.summary: TestEnvironmentOptions.Builder.validateAndBuildWithDefaults() fails in SDK v1.3.1 with 'Only one of the target and channel options can be set at a time' error when creating a TestWorkflowEnvironment, whereas the same code works fine with just build().

issues.title: Provide a way to inject options into Workflow instances
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Request to provide a way to inject options (RetryOptions, ActivityOptions) into Workflow instances for configuration-driven behavior and unit testing, since dependency injection is discouraged.

issues.title: Support for unit testing of Workflows code
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Request for JUnit test rules to enable unit testing of Workflow code with full Temporal API support. Includes ability to mock non-deterministic methods like Workflow.randomUUID for predictable tests, designed to be reusable across other testing frameworks.

issues.title: Reuse of ActivityStubs from another workflow should produce a usable diagnostic or be allowed
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: ActivityStubs created outside of a workflow context (e.g., via DI frameworks as singletons) leak between workflow instances, causing cryptic event loop errors. The issue requests either better diagnostics to identify this misconfiguration or making ActivityStubs safely shareable across workflows.

issues.title: Dependency Injection
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Improve support and safety of Dependency Injection with the Java SDK by discouraging injection into workflow instances (deemed unsafe and non-deterministic) while providing alternative solutions for common DI use cases.

issues.title: Some jobs are forever in 'Running' State with WorkflowTaskFailed Error
issues.author: gosandhya
issues.summary: Workflows intermittently get stuck in Running state with WorkflowTaskFailed error when 20-100 instances are triggered simultaneously. The root cause is a ClassCastException when handling scala.runtime.NonLocalReturnControl, which isn't recognized as a workflow failure exception.

issues.title: SignalTest#testSignalUntyped is flaky
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: SignalTest#testSignalUntyped was a flaky test that was disabled. After investigation and re-enabling, the test has been stable for some time and no longer exhibits flakiness.

issues.title: Non-conventional SNAPSHOT version, lack of support for versions with suffixes
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The Java SDK uses non-standard SNAPSHOT versioning (x.y.z-SNAPSHOT instead of x.y+1.0-SNAPSHOT) and ignores version suffixes in tags, preventing external forks from releasing custom versions with company or feature-specific postfixes.

issues.title: Remove TestWorkflowRule#testTimeoutSeconds
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Remove the deprecated TestWorkflowRule#testTimeoutSeconds method that was deprecated in version 1.4. This cleanup task involves removing the deprecated implementation from the TestWorkflowRule class as part of the 1.5 release.

issues.title: Activities that return with interrupted flag should be successfully reported as Completed
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Activities that return with the interrupted flag set are not properly reported as completed, causing subsequent gRPC calls to fail. The activity result should be reported successfully even when the thread's interrupted flag is set.

issues.title: SelfAdvancingTimerImplTest flakes when test machine is under load
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: SelfAdvancingTimerImplTest flakes intermittently in CI pipelines when the test machine is under load, showing timing assertion failures where the actual elapsed time exceeds the expected value by 55ms.

issues.title: TEMPORAL_DEBUG flag is ignored by deadlock detector in eventLoop
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The TEMPORAL_DEBUG flag is not being checked by the deadlock detector in the SyncWorkflow eventLoop, preventing developers from disabling deadlock detection during testing and debugging.

issues.title: CleanWorkerShutdownTest::testShutdownNow[Docker]
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: CleanWorkerShutdownTest::testShutdownNow fails when running with Docker. The test appears to have environment-specific issues with worker shutdown behavior in containerized environments.

issues.title: Support Spring Proxy classes marked with @Component for activities
issues.author: ginachen-netflix
issues.summary: Spring proxy beans marked with @Component fail to register as activity implementations because the proxy class doesn't properly expose the @ActivityInterface. The issue is that Spring's CGLIB proxies wrap the activity instance but only implement marker interfaces, not the actual activity interfaces.

issues.title: DynamicWorkflow does not handle ApplicationFailure.newNonRetryableFailure correclty
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: DynamicWorkflow fails to handle ApplicationFailure.newNonRetryableFailure correctly, causing workflows to hang and timeout instead of failing immediately as expected.

issues.title: Regression on GrpcRetryer + GrpcDeadlineInterceptor
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: A regression in GrpcRetryer causes requests failing with DEADLINE_EXCEEDED to not be retried when GrpcDeadlineInterceptor sets more granular deadlines than the root gRPC context, potentially causing 1.3.0 to throw exceptions that were previously retried.

issues.title: DEADLINE_EXCEEDED: deadline exceeded after 69.999644732s
issues.author: sergtitov
issues.summary: In-memory Temporal test framework throws DEADLINE_EXCEEDED error after 70 seconds for long-running workflows, while external Temporal instances work fine. The issue occurs when workflow execution time exceeds 70 seconds due to a timeout on the client-side gRPC call.

issues.title: Unable to remove`Workflow#getVersion` calls once added to a workflow
issues.author: jonsie
issues.summary: Removing Workflow#getVersion calls breaks workflow replay even after all old workflow instances complete, preventing clean code removal. The versioning system requires keeping version markers in code indefinitely to maintain replay compatibility.

issues.title: Allow exception logging to be customizable for activity failures
issues.author: markcho
issues.summary: Activity failures using ApplicationFailure.nonRetryableError are logged as errors, polluting logs and external monitoring systems like Sentry. Users request customizable logging for expected activity failures to distinguish them from unexpected failures.

issues.title: Async activity completion with primitive return value converts null to zero
issues.author: osi
issues.summary: When an async activity with a primitive return type completes with null, the value is incorrectly converted to zero instead of raising a NullPointerException. This occurs when the activity is invoked synchronously from the workflow, requiring unboxing of the null completion value.

issues.title: Port fix for following execution chain from Go SDK
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Port the fix for following execution chains from the Go SDK to Java SDK. This involves adding an option to opt-out of following runs when waiting for workflow results, consistent with implementations in Python, TypeScript, and Go SDKs.

issues.title: Flaky LocalActivitiesWorkflowTaskHeartbeatTest#testLocalActivitiesWorkflowTaskHeartbeat
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: LocalActivitiesWorkflowTaskHeartbeatTest#testLocalActivitiesWorkflowTaskHeartbeat test is flaky in buildkite, timing out after 15 seconds.

issues.title: Memo serialization implemented inconsistently
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Memo serialization is implemented inconsistently across the SDK, with some code using user-defined data converters and other code using a default converter. The inconsistency should be resolved by removing reliance on HeaderUtils#intoPayloadMapWithDefaultConverter for all memo serialization.

issues.title: SearchAttributesTest fails against docker due to LocalDateTime serialization problem
issues.author: nagl-stripe
issues.summary: LocalDateTime serialization in search attributes fails against Docker due to format mismatch. The server rejects ISO 8601 datetime strings like '2021-08-26T13:21:52.059738' as invalid values for Datetime-type search attributes, suggesting either a documentation or implementation bug in datetime handling.

issues.title: [Flaky] LongLocalActivityWorkflowTaskHeartbeatFailureTest
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: LongLocalActivityWorkflowTaskHeartbeatFailureTest is flaky in buildkite CI, failing with an assertion error where an activity executed 3 times instead of the expected 2 times.

issues.title: Add an easy way to provide JWT tokens to java-sdk for server calls
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: JWT token authorization for server calls currently requires implementing custom gRPC interceptors, which is cumbersome. The enhancement request seeks a simpler, more user-friendly way to provide JWT tokens, either through built-in JWT-specific interceptors or HeaderProviders on WorkflowClientOptions.

issues.title: GrpcRetryer could lose a real cause in case of DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: GrpcRetryer loses the underlying cause exception when retries exhaust and result in DEADLINE_EXCEEDED, replacing it with the deadline exception and reducing debuggability for users investigating failures.

issues.title: Allow users to specify or influence RpcRetryOptions for all kinds of GrpcRetries
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Users need a way to configure or influence RpcRetryOptions for gRPC retries to tune Temporal for their specific use cases (e.g., microservice orchestration vs. batch processing). The SDK currently provides safe defaults that don't work for all scenarios, particularly regarding initial retry periods.

issues.title: GrpcRetryer should have a special handling of ResourceExhausted exception
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: GrpcRetryer should treat ResourceExhausted exceptions as retryable by default and implement special handling such as more aggressive backoff strategies.

issues.title: Failing DefaultActivityOptionsSetOnWorkflowTest#testSetWorkflowImplementationOptions with Dockerized Temporal
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: Test DefaultActivityOptionsSetOnWorkflowTest#testSetWorkflowImplementationOptions fails inconsistently when run with Dockerized Temporal, with activity timeout being PT2S instead of expected PT3S.

issues.title: Sync versions of GrpcRetryer should throw InterruptedException
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: GrpcRetryer's sync methods hide InterruptedException and instead set an Interrupted flag, making exception handling non-idiomatic. The proposal is to make GrpcRetryer methods explicitly throw InterruptedException to enforce proper handling and make the code more idiomatic.

issues.title: WorkflowExecutionUtils  and GrpcRetryer don't respect reaching deadline from GRPC context and downstream DEADLINE_EXCEEDED exceptions
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionUtils and GrpcRetryer don't respect gRPC deadline propagation from the context, causing them to ignore DEADLINE_EXCEEDED exceptions and continue retrying indefinitely even after the deadline has passed.

issues.title: Make WorkflowStub#getResult timeout configurable on WorkflowOptions
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The getResult() timeout on WorkflowStub is not configurable through WorkflowOptions when using the proxy API. Currently, users must use the low-level stub API to set a custom timeout, while the proxy API defaults to Integer.MAX_VALUE, preventing reasonable timeouts from being enforced.

issues.title: Change the default behavior of retries in WorkflowExecutionUtils#getInstanceCloseEvent
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionUtils#getInstanceCloseEvent lacks exponential backoff, causing clients to hammer the server during outages. The proposal is to add configurable retry behavior with backoff coefficients and maximum intervals.

issues.title: Add unit tests for WorkflowExecutionUtils#getInstanceCloseEvent
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionUtils class lacks unit test coverage due to being untestable and unmockable. The class needs to be decoupled into testable pieces, starting with tests for the getInstanceCloseEvent method and issues fixed in PR #472.

issues.title: Version StateMachine causes different in workflow task structure in replays breaking cancelations and leading to incorrect command-event matches
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Workflow.getVersion() calls during replays cause premature workflow task completion, leading to different task structures between original execution and replays. This breaks command-event matching for cancelations, causing replay failures when timers are canceled within the same workflow task.

issues.title: Make `ApplicationFailure#newFromValues` public
issues.author: jonsie
issues.summary: Request to make the `ApplicationFailure#newFromValues` method public so developers can set the `cause` field on ApplicationFailure instances. Currently, the method is not accessible for public use.

issues.title: Unexpected WFT Completed events in java bench runs
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Workflow Task Completed events are unexpectedly being replayed and causing state machine failures in Java SDK benchmarks, particularly in the reactor_stress test with sticky worker eviction. The state machines receive duplicate events they've already processed, leading to workflow execution failures.

issues.title: NPE during performance testing
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: NullPointerException occurring during performance tests in WorkflowThreadContext.runUntilBlocked(), indicating a potential multithreading issue or race condition in workflow execution.

issues.title: Global timeout should be relocated from TestWorkflowRule to SDKTestWorkflowRule
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: TestWorkflowRule enforces a 10-second global timeout by default, which creates unnecessary friction for users and duplicates JUnit's built-in timeout capabilities. The proposal is to move timeout logic to the internal SDKTestWorkflowRule, remove it from the public TestWorkflowRule, and deprecate the functionality.

issues.title: Running in TEMPORAL_DEBUG mode should turn off TestWorkflowRule timeouts
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: TestWorkflowRule enforces a 10-second timeout by default for tests, which is problematic during debugging. The request is to disable this timeout when the TEMPORAL_DEBUG environment variable is present to improve developer productivity.

issues.title: DeterministicRunner is noisy about not accessed cancelled scopes and timers
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: DeterministicRunner logs noisy warnings about unaccessed cancelled scopes and timers, even though this is expected behavior. When a cancellation scope is cancelled, it's normal that promises created within it won't be accessed, so the warning should be suppressed in these cases.

issues.title: Flaky testShouldReturnQueryResultAfterWorkflowTimeout
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Test `testShouldReturnQueryResultAfterWorkflowTimeout` is flaky and fails with 'Unknown query type' error when querying a workflow after it times out. The root cause is that query handlers are not reinitialized during workflow replay after a timeout, leaving the QueryDispatcher empty.

issues.title: In TestWorkflowEnviornment, getResult() hangs after terminate()
issues.author: nagl-stripe
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment's getResult() hangs indefinitely after terminate() instead of throwing WorkflowFailedException like the real server does. The test environment should match production behavior when a workflow is terminated.

issues.title: Excessive retries in test workflow environment
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Testing activities that constantly fail with large timeout values causes excessive retries (thousands) in test framework, slowing down tests. Request to add option to limit retries or skip time during testing to handle this edge case.

issues.title: Use `WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_NON_DETERMINISTIC_ERROR` for non-deterministic workflow
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Use `WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_NON_DETERMINISTIC_ERROR` as the cause when responding to failed workflow tasks that result from non-deterministic user workflow logic. This aligns the Java SDK with the Temporal server's error classification.

issues.title: Upsert memo support
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: Add support for upsert memo operations during workflow execution. Currently, users can only set memo at workflow start time, but they should be able to modify/upsert memo during execution using the existing ModifyWorkflowPropertiesCommandAttributes command.

issues.title: Opentracing: "UnsupportedFormatException: Builtin.TEXT_MAP_INJECT" with Jaeger tracer
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: OpenTracing integration with Jaeger tracer fails with UnsupportedFormatException for TEXT_MAP_INJECT format. The Java SDK's OpenTracing support is incompatible with Jaeger client's format handling strategy.

issues.title: a load balancer with an idle timeout causes java sdk to log UNAVAILABLE errors
issues.author: thewmo
issues.summary: Java SDK logs ERROR-level exceptions when a load balancer closes idle polling connections, causing log spam despite no functional impact. The SDK should recognize these as harmless transient errors and log them at DEBUG level instead.

issues.title: Deserialize Search Attributes
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: WorkflowInfo.getSearchAttributes() currently returns serialized protobuf data, making it difficult for users to read and interpret. Users need deserialized search attributes in an easily consumable format.

issues.title: State Machine fails to handle correctly some corner cases of Workflow Versioning
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: State Machine fails to handle certain corner cases with Workflow.getVersion calls, as demonstrated in PR #583. The versioning logic does not correctly process all scenarios.

issues.title: Calling workflow method on the workflow stub should always wait for the workflow completion.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: When a workflow stub is created using a workflowId, calling a workflow method should block waiting for the result if a workflow with that ID is already running, rather than throwing an exception. Currently it throws an exception instead.

issues.title: JUnit's @test(timeout) annotation should override TestWorkflowRule settings
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: JUnit's @Test(timeout) annotation should override the default 10-second timeout set on SDKTestWorkflowRule, but currently it doesn't. Users must work around this by setting a different timeout on the rule itself, which affects all tests in the class.

issues.title: GRPC falling into in-process server long polls after interruption breaks graceful Worker Pollers shutdown
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: GRPC falls into in-process server long polls after thread interruption, causing Worker Poller threads to hang during graceful shutdown. This occurs only with the in-process test server and specific timing conditions where long poll tasks are submitted after thread interruption.

issues.title: Automate pre-release SDK testing against samples-java & canary-java
issues.author: vkoby
issues.summary: Request to automate pre-release SDK testing against samples-java and canary-java repositories. Currently this testing is performed manually and needs to be automated as part of the release process.

issues.title: Allow context propagator to be set on LocalActivityOptions
issues.author: ravikrn13
issues.summary: User requested the ability to set custom ContextPropagators on LocalActivityOptions, similar to ActivityOptions. This was marked invalid as a duplicate of issue #490, with the resolution that ContextPropagators should be configured via WorkerOptions instead.

issues.title: Default MDC entries not propagated to LocalActivities
issues.author: ravikrn13
issues.summary: MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context) entries like WorkflowId and RunId were not being propagated to LocalActivities, causing logging context information to be missing when local activities were invoked. The ActivityWorker had MDC setup code that was absent in LocalActivityWorker.

issues.title: Support assertions in `TestWorkflowEnvironment.registerDelayedCallback`
issues.author: zhxnlai
issues.summary: Assertions that fail in TestWorkflowEnvironment.registerDelayedCallback are swallowed instead of propagating to the test, causing tests that should fail to succeed with only error logs.

issues.title: Method overrides should be allowed when signal names are different
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Signal method overloading is rejected even when @SignalMethod(name=...) assigns different signal names. The validation logic doesn't consider the signal name annotation when checking for duplicate methods, preventing legitimate method overloads.

issues.title: Worker identity is not recorded during heartbeat
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Worker identity is not being recorded in the lastWorkerIdentity field during activity heartbeats. The field remains empty instead of containing the worker's identity information.

issues.title: Make `TEMPORAL_DEBUG` definable via code
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: User requested the ability to set TEMPORAL_DEBUG via code instead of environment variables, to simplify debugging workflows in tests without needing multiple IDE run configurations.

issues.title: Set TemporalChangeVersion when workflow version is updated
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Add TemporalChangeVersion search attribute to Java SDK when workflow version is updated, enabling users to query workflows by their version state. This feature is already implemented in the Go SDK but missing from Java.

issues.title: Activities advised with AspectJ are not recognised as implementation of @ActivityInterface anymore
issues.author: adriil
issues.summary: Activities advised with AspectJ are not recognized as implementing @ActivityInterface when Spring CGLIB proxies create wrapper classes. The SDK's metadata validation fails because it receives the proxy class instead of the actual implementation class.

issues.title: TestEnv: WorkflowStub.getResult seems to skip timer
issues.author: rubyhfu
issues.summary: WorkflowStub.getResult() skips timers in TestEnv without requiring testEnv.sleep(). User expected the second timer to wait 10 minutes but it completes immediately after the first timer, suggesting time-skipping behavior that wasn't documented.

issues.title: TestEnv: using workflowExecutionTimeout with testEnv.sleep() makes the test hang
issues.author: rubyhfu
issues.summary: Test hangs when workflowExecutionTimeout is set on workflow options and testEnv.sleep() is used in the same test. The timeout conflicts with the test environment's time advancement mechanism, causing deadlock.

issues.title: TestEnv: Failure signalling an *terminated* external workflow execution from another workflow
issues.author: rubyhfu
issues.summary: TestEnv fails when signaling a terminated external workflow execution from another workflow, throwing a FAILED_PRECONDITION error about adding an event after completion instead of properly signaling ApplicationFailure like it does for closed workflows.

issues.title: temporal_local_activity_failed never logged
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Local activity failures are incorrectly incremented under the temporal_activity_execution_failed counter instead of the temporal_local_activity_failed counter, causing metric tracking to be inaccurate for systems using only local activities.

issues.title: Fix workflow event JSON to work with Java SDK WorkflowReplayer
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: WorkflowReplayer cannot parse workflow history JSON exported by tctl because the event type names differ from what the Java SDK expects. The tctl output uses EVENT_TYPE_ prefixes (e.g., EVENT_TYPE_WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_STARTED) while WorkflowReplayer expects names without the prefix (e.g., WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_STARTED).

issues.title: ProtobufJsonPayloadConverter not using custom printer
issues.author: mschielmann
issues.summary: ProtobufJsonPayloadConverter is using a default JsonFormat.Printer instead of the custom printer passed through the constructor, due to a variable shadowing issue on line 60.

issues.title: Open tracing span context not propagated when activity or child workflow invoked asynchronously
issues.author: smax48
issues.summary: Open tracing span context is not propagated when activities or child workflows are invoked asynchronously, resulting in isolated traces instead of a continuous trace chain. The issue was fixed for both Kotlin method references and async lambdas.

issues.title: Add pollExecutor thread pool metrics
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Request to add thread pool metrics for the pollExecutor to help understand SDK thread usage and tune workers. The main challenge is identifying worker groups consistently across process deployments while maintaining unique identity per worker.

issues.title: Allow context propagators & interceptors to populate ActivityExecutionContext
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Enhancement request to allow context propagators and interceptors to populate ActivityExecutionContext, enabling cleaner access to propagated context information from activities instead of relying on ThreadLocal patterns.

issues.title: Java SDK 1.0.8 is noisy on shutdown
issues.author: GreyTeardrop
issues.summary: Java SDK 1.0.8 logs InterruptedException and StatusRuntimeException errors during graceful worker shutdown, despite the shutdown completing successfully. These errors pollute application logs and appear to be related to thread interruption in gRPC polling operations.

issues.title: DescribeWorkflowExecution is not implemented for the java test service.
issues.author: drewhoskins-stripe
issues.summary: The DescribeWorkflowExecution gRPC method is not implemented in the Java test service, causing failures when tests attempt to use this method.

issues.title: Missing getMemo functionality in WorkflowInfo
issues.author: mobiletoly
issues.summary: WorkflowInfo interface is missing a getMemo() method to retrieve memos set via WorkflowOptions.Builder.setMemo(), making the memo feature impractical in the Java SDK.

issues.title: Make DEFAULT_DEADLOCK_DETECTION_TIMEOUT configurable
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: User requests making the DEFAULT_DEADLOCK_DETECTION_TIMEOUT configurable because their custom data converter can exceed the 1 second timeout under certain cluster conditions. Currently hardcoded, this limitation forces users to fork the SDK to work around it.

issues.title: OpenTracing: support pluggable strategy for span naming/tagging
issues.author: sdwr98
issues.summary: Request to make OpenTracing span naming and tagging pluggable to support different APM systems like DataDog that expect different span naming conventions (e.g., generic span names with metadata in tags rather than concatenated names).

issues.title: Child workflow signal / cancellation should not use run ID
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Child workflow signal and cancellation operations incorrectly include RunId and set ChildWorkflowOnly to false, which can cause signals to be delivered to unrelated workflows if the child workflow completes and a new workflow reuses the same workflow ID.

issues.title: Handle all exceptions as non-retryable when TEMPORAL_DEBUG is set
issues.author: mobiletoly
issues.summary: Feature request to handle all exceptions as non-retryable when TEMPORAL_DEBUG environment variable is set, to improve troubleshooting during development by preventing automatic retries of core exceptions like NullPointerException and InvalidArgumentException.

issues.title: Add LocalActivityOption#contextPropagators
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Feature request to add LocalActivityOption#contextPropagators to support context propagation for local activities, analogous to the existing ActivityOption#contextPropagators API.

issues.title: ContextPropagators don't work for local activities
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: ContextPropagators are not being applied to local activities despite working correctly for regular activities. This causes context propagation to fail for local activity invocations.

issues.title: How to set / update search attribute values during Workflow / Activity runtime ?
issues.author: anandundavia
issues.summary: User asks how to update search attribute values during workflow/activity runtime, particularly for use cases like tracking when the last email was sent. A solution using `Workflow.upsertSearchAttributes` is provided, though it only works from workflow code, not from activities.

issues.title: Unable to replay a workflow after adding workflow versioning
issues.author: srekapalli
issues.summary: Workflow replay fails with an IllegalStateException when local activity versioning is added using Workflow.getVersion(). The error occurs when replaying event history that contains local activity markers that were executed before the versioning logic was introduced.

issues.title: Allow configuration of workers to back off completely if the server is not available
issues.author: eminn
issues.summary: Request to allow workers to gracefully fail and stop retrying when the server is unavailable, with configurable backoff and maximum retry periods to improve deployment health checks in containerized environments.

issues.title: GrpcRetryer#retryWithResultAsync doesn't perform retries in some cases
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: GrpcRetryer#retryWithResultAsync fails to perform retries when exceptions are thrown from the supplied function because CompletionException is not properly unwrapped and processed.

issues.title: Child workflows do not receive search attributes (or memo)
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Child workflows are not created with search attributes and memo, unlike regular workflows. The issue is traced to missing code in SyncWorkflowContext::executeChildWorkflow that should set these properties.

issues.title: WorkflowExecutionUtils#getInstanceCloseEvent could get into infinite loop after timeout
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionUtils#getInstanceCloseEvent can enter an infinite loop after a timeout when receiving empty responses, never enforcing the timeout check.

issues.title: DataConverter is (surprisingly?) used for custom search attributes
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: DataConverter is unexpectedly applied to custom search attributes in addition to workflow/activity arguments, causing serialization issues when values are sent to Elasticsearch. The proper behavior should distinguish between serializing workflow/activity parameters versus search attributes and memo.

issues.title: Register multiple activity names for an activity
issues.author: jonsie
issues.summary: Request to register multiple activity names for a single activity to support refactoring scenarios where activity names change. This enables smooth migration where workers can recognize both old and new activity names, with potential for marking names as deprecated.

issues.title: Allow passing proxy objects to registerActivitiesImplementations
issues.author: mostafacs
issues.summary: User asks if proxy objects (commonly used with Quarkus interceptors) can be passed to registerActivitiesImplementations. Discussion suggests this should already work if proxies implement ActivityInterface, but user seeks confirmation or feature enhancement for better interceptor support.

issues.title: Allow passing proxy objects to registerActivitiesImplementations
issues.author: mostafacs
issues.summary: Request to support proxy objects in registerActivitiesImplementations to enable Quarkus interceptor integration. The user is building a Quarkus extension for Temporal and needs to pass proxy objects created by Quarkus interceptors for activities.

issues.title: Please add ActivityCompletionClient support in TestActivityEnvironment
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Request to add ActivityCompletionClient support in TestActivityEnvironment to enable asynchronous activity completion testing. This is a duplicate of issue #2097.

issues.title: testEnv.sleep doesn't work as expected and hangs
issues.author: rubyhfu
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment.sleep() hangs instead of skipping workflow timers as expected. When using testEnv.sleep() to advance past Workflow.await() calls with long durations, tests hang indefinitely rather than progressing through the workflow execution.

issues.title: Duplicate concurrent workflow - hangs on completion
issues.author: smax48
issues.summary: Test environment hangs indefinitely when waiting for completion of a duplicate concurrent workflow with WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_REJECT_DUPLICATE, while the same code works correctly with real Temporal containers.

issues.title: Flaky test: testExceptionOnStart
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Test testExceptionOnStart flakes intermittently due to a deadlock when gRPC channel shutdown is blocked by a long poll from a worker thread. The workflow poller holds a lock while waiting on a queue poll, preventing the channel from shutting down properly.

issues.title: Change log level from ERROR to INFO for failed workflow task caused by signal race condition
issues.author: sunshineo
issues.summary: Worker logs ERROR when rejecting a workflow close request due to a signal race condition, but the workflow eventually closes successfully after signal processing. The log level should be INFO instead of ERROR since this is expected behavior in concurrent signal/close scenarios.

issues.title: MicrometerClientStatsReporter overrides registry's naming convention
issues.author: GreyTeardrop
issues.summary: MicrometerClientStatsReporter overrides the MeterRegistry's native naming convention and always uses snake_case, which breaks compatibility with applications using different conventions like Datadog's dot-separated format.

issues.title: TestWorkflowService doesn't pass headers into workflow retry
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: TestWorkflowService doesn't pass headers into workflow retry. When workflow retries occur after a failure, the retry runs receive empty headers instead of the same headers as the initial run.

issues.title: TestWorkflowRule get workerInterceptors from two different sources and merges them incorrectly
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: TestWorkflowRule incorrectly merges workerInterceptors from two different sources, causing user-provided interceptors to be discarded when both setWorkerFactoryOptions() and setWorkerInterceptors() are used.

issues.title: Workflow retry after Activity failure works incorrectly with TestService
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Workflow retry after activity failure doesn't work correctly with TestService. When an activity is configured to fail once then succeed, and the workflow is configured to retry, the workflow fails in unit tests instead of retrying, but passes when using an external service.

issues.title: Workflow#newActivityStub(activityInterface) method produces broken activity stubs
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The Workflow#newActivityStub(activityInterface) method without ActivityOptions produces invalid activity stubs because ActivityOptions lacks default values for required timeouts (startToClose or scheduleToClose). The method needs either proper defaults or to enforce validation that throws an exception when timeouts are missing.

issues.title: Prohibit use of WorkflowClient and Activity interfaces in workflow code.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Enforce runtime checks to prevent WorkflowClient and Activity interface usage from workflow code, which violates nondeterminism requirements and can cause bugs. New developers may inadvertently use these prohibited APIs without understanding the constraints.

issues.title: Activity retry not happening in cron workflow
issues.author: arjunacharya10
issues.summary: Activity retries are not being executed in cron workflows. When a cron workflow is triggered multiple times and activities fail, the retries don't occur as expected - activities are only called once per workflow run instead of with configured retry attempts.

issues.title: Workflow as a cron job executing more number of times than expected
issues.author: arjunacharya10
issues.summary: Cron workflow in Java SDK test framework executes twice as many times as expected. A workflow scheduled to run every 30 days executes 6 times in 90 days instead of the expected 3 times, with the root cause being that the workflow executes immediately on start plus additional unexpected executions.

issues.title: Pluggable activity name provider
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to make activity name generation pluggable through ClientOptions and WorkerOptions, allowing users to implement custom naming standards for activities instead of relying on automatic method-name-based generation.

issues.title: TimeLockingFuture implementation is incorrect and easy to break
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: TimeLockingFuture's time-skipping functionality breaks when CompletableFuture is chained using standard methods like thenApply(). The implementation is brittle because it only intercepts get() and join() calls on the original future, not on chained futures, making the feature unreliable for typical async patterns.

issues.title: Query failure on terminated workflow
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Querying a terminated workflow throws a WorkflowQueryException due to improper handling of the WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_TERMINATED event during query processing. The replay mechanism fails when attempting to handle this event, resulting in an IllegalArgumentException for unexpected events.

issues.title: API docs erroneously claim WorkflowIdReusePolicy default is AllowDuplicateFailedOnly
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: API documentation for WorkflowOptions incorrectly states that the default WorkflowIdReusePolicy is AllowDuplicateFailedOnly, when it should be AllowDuplicate.

issues.title: Interceptors: Add missing header to activity and client interceptors
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add support for injecting context into headers when starting workflows and executing activities through client and activity interceptors.

issues.title: When a workflow task fails and the workflow is still running, cancel request doesn't seem to work
issues.author: darewreck54
issues.summary: Workflow cancellation requests return 204 but fail to cancel workflows that are stuck after a workflow task failure. The workflow continues running indefinitely with no way to cancel it via the API, though new workflows can be canceled normally.

issues.title: Add per method activity options
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to support per-method activity options in Java SDK, allowing different timeouts and configurations for individual activities within a common activity interface without requiring separate stubs.

issues.title: Connection management issues with Java SDK
issues.author: kelnos
issues.summary: Java SDK workers experience connection timeouts and availability issues during Temporal cluster deployments. The SDK fails to transparently recover from topology changes and server-side connection closures, causing activity pollers to report UNAVAILABLE and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors.

issues.title: Default WorkflowIdReusePolicy is AllowDuplicate and not AllowDuplicateFailedOnly
issues.author: kartikv11
issues.summary: The default WorkflowIdReusePolicy in the Java SDK is set to AllowDuplicate instead of AllowDuplicateFailedOnly as documented. This allows duplicate workflow IDs to execute concurrently when they should only be allowed for failed workflows.

issues.title: [Bug] Query page broken after upgrading to 1.6.3 server
issues.author: madhukkc
issues.summary: Query page shows blank 'no queries registered' message after upgrading to server 1.6.3, even though workflows have query methods defined. The issue is caused by a change in error message format where the SDK no longer returns registered query names in the exception message.

issues.title: Log messages emitted by POJOActivityTaskHandler should include workflow ID and run ID
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: Activity failure logs in POJOActivityTaskHandler lack workflow ID and run ID context, making it difficult to trace activities back to their workflows. The request is to include these identifiers in log messages since they're already available in ActivityInfo.

issues.title: Don't perform a long poll of the execution result if nobody waits on it
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: WorkflowClient.execute initiates a long poll for execution history immediately upon being called, rather than lazily when the returned CompletableFuture is actually waited on. This causes unnecessary polling even when the result is never accessed.

issues.title: maven packages for java client
issues.author: MaksimRT
issues.summary: Request to publish official Maven packages for the Java SDK to Maven Central Repository, similar to the existing Cadence client package. Currently requires using snapshots from Sonatype.

issues.title: Support robfig style cron defs in TestWorkflowEnvironment
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not support robfig-style cron expressions like "@every 30s", which work on a real Temporal server but fail with an INVALID_ARGUMENT error indicating the expression format is incorrect.

issues.title: Support workflow metadata query
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to add a workflow metadata query that returns supported queries and signals. Currently, UI must emit unsupported queries and parse error messages to discover supported operations, causing unnecessary service logging.

issues.title: Was io.temporal.testing.TestWorkflowEnvironment removed with 1.0.4?
issues.author: darewreck54
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment was moved from io.temporal.testing to a new temporal-testing module in v1.0.5, breaking imports for users upgrading from v1.0.4. User requests better documentation of breaking changes.

issues.title: Test with mock activity doesn't work with Mockito version 2
issues.author: frank-le
issues.summary: Testing with mock activities fails when using Mockito version 2+ due to annotation copying behavior. The error 'This annotation can be used only on the interface method it implements' occurs because newer Mockito versions copy all annotations to mocks, conflicting with Temporal's POJOActivityImplMetadata validation.

issues.title: Customizable RpcRetryOptions in ServiceStubsOptions
issues.author: CalPeterWu
issues.summary: User requests ability to customize gRPC retry options in ServiceStubsOptions. Currently, gRPC retries for up to 1 minute on deadline exceeded, which is too long for their use case. They want finer control over retry behavior similar to existing timeout configuration options.

issues.title: JSON de-serializer fails on field additions and removals
issues.author: ranand-git
issues.summary: JSON deserialization fails when workflow/activity input data classes change between deployments (fields added, removed, or type-changed). Old workers cannot deserialize new data formats, breaking backward compatibility during rolling updates.

issues.title: Javadoc for WorkflowClient refers to wrong API
issues.author: sivasamyk
issues.summary: Javadoc for WorkflowClient class refers to an incorrect method signature `newInstance(temporalServiceHost, temporalServicePort, namespace)` that doesn't exist in the actual API. The documentation needs to be updated to reference the correct method.

issues.title: Better handling of WorkflowFailedException exception
issues.author: mobiletoly
issues.summary: WorkflowFailedException wrapping makes it difficult for callers to handle errors consistently, as the same ApplicationFailure thrown from different execution contexts (Activity vs Workflow) gets wrapped differently (ActivityFailure vs ApplicationFailure), requiring callers to know internal implementation details.

issues.title: Throwing non-retriable failure ignored by local activities
issues.author: mobiletoly
issues.summary: Local activities incorrectly retry when throwing ApplicationFailure.newNonRetryableFailure, while regular activities handle this correctly. The non-retryable failure exception is being ignored by the local activity execution framework.

issues.title: check-updates is deprecated
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The Gradle check-updates plugin is deprecated and should be replaced with automatic dependency update tools like Renovate or Dependabot.

issues.title: Published artifacts do not include sources for the generated code
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Generated sources for protobuf-generated code in temporal-serviceclient are not being published in source/javadoc JARs alongside compiled artifacts. While hand-written sources are included, the generated gRPC service client sources are missing from published Maven artifacts.

issues.title: inconsistent tag names between server and sdk
issues.author: kkcmadhu
issues.summary: Tag names are inconsistent between Temporal Server and SDKs (Java, Go), causing SDK metrics to not appear in Grafana dashboards. The issue involves discrepancies like 'Namespace' in SDK vs 'namespace' in Server, preventing real namespace data from being displayed.

issues.title: Do not fail stack trace query on a closed workflow. But return empty stack
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Stack trace queries on closed workflows throw an INVALID_ARGUMENT error instead of gracefully returning empty stack or a human-readable message indicating the workflow is closed.

issues.title: WorkflowServiceStubs (sdk 1.0.4) instantiation fails within spring service
issues.author: bhaskara-illumina
issues.summary: WorkflowServiceStubs instantiation fails in Spring service due to gRPC version mismatch. The application requires grpc-netty-shaded 1.33.1+ (method maxInboundMessageSize added in later versions), but the user's dependency tree shows 1.30.2.

issues.title: ActivityCompletionClient's completeExceptionally doesn't work with ApplicationFailure
issues.author: rubyhfu
issues.summary: ActivityCompletionClient's completeExceptionally method throws an IllegalStateException when used with ApplicationFailure exceptions because the converter is not set, preventing proper exception serialization.

issues.title: Run Saga compensations in a disconnected scope
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Saga compensations are currently executed in the current cancellation scope, which prevents them from running when the workflow is cancelled. The feature request is to execute compensations in a disconnected cancellation scope by default, with an option to disable this behavior.

issues.title: Print stacktrace coming from another language in the exception message
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: StackTrace is empty when failure comes from another language SDK. The system cannot deserialize stack traces from other languages into Java-specific format, making cross-language error debugging difficult.

issues.title: Worker.replayWorkflowExecution does not report replay failures
issues.author: GreyTeardrop
issues.summary: Worker.replayWorkflowExecution() swallows all exceptions without reporting replay failures, causing replay tests to never fail even when breaking changes are made to the workflow. The method catches and silently ignores all exceptions, preventing detection of workflow incompatibilities.

issues.title: WorkflowExecutionHistory.fromJson does not support JSONs exported via Web console or CLI
issues.author: GreyTeardrop
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionHistory.fromJson() cannot deserialize workflow history exported from Temporal Web console or CLI, due to differences in JSON schema (date/time format and enum representation) compared to what the Java SDK expects.

issues.title: Native image descriptor for GraalVM
issues.author: mostafacs
issues.summary: Request to support GraalVM native image compilation for the Java SDK to enable reduced memory footprint and faster startup times. The community has provided native-image descriptors and the team has documented the approach for users to provide their own proxy configurations.

issues.title: Support Workflow.getInfo from query method body
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow.getInfo() method fails when called from within a query handler because the query thread is not a workflow thread. Users need access to workflow information from query methods.

issues.title: Flaky whenStickyIsEnabledThenTheWorkflowIsCachedChildWorkflows test
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The whenStickyIsEnabledThenTheWorkflowIsCachedChildWorkflows test is flaky, failing intermittently with an assertion error expecting 2 but getting 1. The test verifies that workflows are properly cached when sticky worker mode is enabled for child workflows.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment: Set close time on the visibility record
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment does not set the close time on the visibility record for workflow execution info. This causes tests to not properly reflect workflow completion time metadata.

issues.title: Add WorkflowTest Rule
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Create a @WorkflowTest JUnit rule to encapsulate WorkflowTestEnvironment setup, teardown, and configuration (globalTimeout, watchman) to reduce boilerplate code in test classes.

issues.title: Add opentracing context propagator
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add an OpenTracing context propagator for the Java SDK. The implementation should be compatible with OpenTelemetry since OpenTracing is now part of the OpenTelemetry project.

issues.title: Expose previous run failure though workflow context API
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Add API to expose the failure of a previous workflow run through the workflow context, similar to the existing getLastCompletionResult API. This is needed when continueAsNew is triggered due to cron or retry policy.

issues.title: Unexpected Heartbeat errors when activities are queued up
issues.author: cmlenius
issues.summary: Activities fail with heartbeat errors when tasks are queued and workers are at max concurrency. The activity expires in the buffer before any worker can start it, causing heartbeat attempts to fail with 'workflow already completed' errors.

issues.title: PollActivityTaskQueue should return empty poll after a minute
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The test service's PollActivityTaskQueue doesn't return empty polls after a timeout like the real service does, causing gRPC-level request timeouts. The feature request is to make the test service return an empty poll after one minute of no available tasks.

issues.title: Support dynamic activity and workflow implementations
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to support dynamic loading of activity and workflow implementations at runtime, similar to Java app engines using class loaders. The SDK should expose a factory interface that allows providing untyped activity/workflow implementations based on their type.

issues.title: Make PollerOptions.uncaughtExceptionHandler from workflowOptions etc.
issues.author: maxnilz
issues.summary: User requests the ability to configure PollerOptions.uncaughtExceptionHandler through WorkflowOptions or similar configuration mechanism, as currently there is no way to customize exception handling for uncaught exceptions thrown by the poller.

issues.title: Support building with JDK 9 or later
issues.author: shyamalprasad
issues.summary: temporal-serviceclient library cannot be compiled with JDK 9 or later due to missing javax.annotation.Generated class. The JSR-250 javax.annotation package needs to be added as a dependency for JDK 9+ compatibility.

issues.title: Expose activity start and completion information to the workflow code.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow code currently cannot access activity start and completion time information that exists in the workflow history. Users need an API to retrieve full activity execution details including the exact time an activity started and completed on the worker.

issues.title: Enable Serialization on WorkflowQueue
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: WorkflowQueue needs to implement Serializable to enable storing ordered event processing across workflow executions without long-running workflows. This is a Java SDK enhancement that would allow the technique described in a community discussion to be properly implemented.

issues.title: @SignalMethod threading configuration
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Signal methods in Java SDK currently execute in separate threads per signal, allowing concurrent handling. Request is to add threading configuration option to @SignalMethod to support single-threaded sequential signal processing with built-in queueing.

issues.title: WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurred
issues.author: ilmn-aeolus
issues.summary: CheckedExceptionWrapper uses reflection to access java.lang.Throwable.cause, triggering illegal reflective access warnings in Java 9+. These warnings appear when running workflows and persist across versions.

issues.title: Block of copied code
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: A block of code appears to be duplicated in ActivityPollTask.java around line 78, though it doesn't appear to cause functional issues. This was resolved as a duplicate of issue #478.

issues.title: ensureDefaultFieldsForActivityRetryPolicy in testService don't rewrite nonRetryableErrorTypes
issues.author: filipmigdalski
issues.summary: The testService's ensureDefaultFieldsForActivityRetryPolicy method does not rewrite nonRetryableErrorTypes field, causing retry policies to be incomplete. This blocks users from properly testing setDoNotRetry retry policies in unit tests.

issues.title: STICKY_CACHE_THREAD_FORCED_EVICTION double reporting
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: The STICKY_CACHE_THREAD_FORCED_EVICTION metric is being incremented twice when a workflow thread evicts from cache due to full thread pool - once in WorkflowThreadImpl#start and again inside cache.evictAnyNotInProcessing. Additionally, there are concerns about the retry logic that attempts resubmission after successful eviction despite no change in thread pool availability.

issues.title: Java SDK metrics don't work correctly with PrometheusRegistry
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: PrometheusRegistry rejects metrics from MicrometerClientStatsReporter because different SDK components report the same metric with inconsistent tag sets. Prometheus requires all meters with the same name to have identical tag keys, but the SDK attempts to maximize useful data by dynamically including/excluding tags based on operation context.

issues.title: Update all state machines to avoid self transitions and hidden logic
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Refactor workflow state machines to eliminate self-transitions and hidden conditional logic by introducing explicit states. This includes eliminating self-transitions in ActivityStateMachine and converting cancellationType from conditional logic to state-based modeling.

issues.title: Netty NioEventLoop exception
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Intermittent NioEventLoop exceptions causing gRPC selector failures in unit tests, manifesting as 'Invalid argument' errors in the KQueue selector on macOS.

issues.title: ClassCastException interfering with error propagation
issues.author: ilmn-aeolus
issues.summary: A ClassCastException occurs when an Activity throws an Error instead of an Exception, preventing proper error propagation and masking the actual failure. This happens because the activity handler tries to cast a Throwable to Exception without handling Error subclasses.

issues.title: Incorrect Temporal Error handling in POJOActivityInboundCallsInterceptor
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Incorrect error handling in POJOActivityInboundCallsInterceptor loses the root cause exception (java.lang.Error) and masks it with a ClassCastException. When calling Workflow methods from within an Activity, the meaningful error message is lost.

issues.title: Support development with recent JDK
issues.author: shyamalprasad
issues.summary: Add support for building the Java SDK with recent JDK versions (JDK 11 and JDK 14). The changes required are minimal: updating the annotations module for JDK 9 compatibility and handling the `yield` keyword that became reserved in JDK 14.

issues.title: The constraint about activity's scheduleToClose or scheduleToStart & startToClose should be defined is not enforced
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: LocalActivityOptions builder allows creating activity stubs without required timeout constraints (scheduleToCloseTimeout or both scheduleToStartTimeout and startToCloseTimeout), violating documented requirements. Validation was moved to the service but should also be enforced in the SDK for local activities.

issues.title: Not specifying optional maxInterval in RetryOptions causes an cryptic exception if activity fails
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: When RetryOptions is configured without specifying maxInterval for local activities, the SDK silently uses PT0S (zero duration) which causes an IllegalArgumentException during activity execution. This leads to cryptic errors and complete workflow hangs.

issues.title: ArithmeticException in ReplayWorkflowExecutor after some amount of requests
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: ArithmeticException occurs in ReplayWorkflowExecutor after ~30 requests when executing multiple workflows without a workflow execution timeout. The exception is caused by time skipping logic jumping years ahead for completed workflow timers, leading to durations that M3 metrics cannot handle.

issues.title: Failing to mark Activity or Workflow interface as public is hard to diagnose
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Failing to mark an Activity or Workflow interface as public produces a cryptic runtime error about invoking a public abstract method instead of a clear diagnostic message indicating the interface must be public.

issues.title: Regression with a workflow implementing an empty marker interface
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Regression in 0.28.0 where workflows implementing empty marker interfaces fail with IllegalArgumentException. The code now throws an exception for interfaces without Temporal annotations, whereas 0.26.0 allowed them.

issues.title: Exceptions being thrown on execution with Spring related to gRPC and PerfMark
issues.author: fcruzel
issues.summary: Spring-based Temporal applications generate several non-fatal exceptions related to gRPC and PerfMark during initialization and execution, including Epoll availability errors, missing census stats classes, and PerfMark initialization failures. While these exceptions do not prevent workflows from executing correctly, they cause confusing debug output.

issues.title: Java SDK payload headers is out of sync with what go SDK / server uses
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Java SDK payload headers protocol is out of sync with Go SDK and the server. A protocol change was made in the Go SDK that needs to be implemented in the Java SDK to maintain compatibility.

issues.title: java.time.OffsetDateTime deserialization failing
issues.author: myfancypants
issues.summary: OffsetDateTime deserialization fails in version 0.27.0 due to Jackson not being able to deserialize the ZoneOffset component. This is a regression from version 0.26.0 and causes workflow execution failures.

issues.title: Workflow.wrap and Activity.wrap fail on chained Throwable
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity.wrap and Workflow.wrap fail when wrapping an ActivityFailure with a chained Throwable cause instead of an Exception. The issue occurs in CheckedExceptionWrapper.unwrap which incorrectly assumes exception causes are either Error or Exception, not arbitrary Throwable types.

issues.title: Block workflow instead of failing on unexpected exceptions
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow methods throwing unexpected exceptions should block the workflow for fixing rather than fail it outright. Currently only Errors block workflows; the proposal is to extend this behavior to exceptions not in a failure list, allowing workflows to resume automatically after code fixes without manual intervention.

issues.title: newUntypedWorkflowStub should check if runId.isPresent() before calling get
issues.author: spozharov
issues.summary: The newUntypedWorkflowStub method should check if runId is present before calling get() to avoid potential NullPointerException. This is a defensive programming issue in the WorkflowClientInternal class.

issues.title: Need ability to modify ObjectMapper created by JacksonJsonPayloadConverter
issues.author: kelnos
issues.summary: Users need access to the ObjectMapper created by JacksonJsonPayloadConverter to add custom Jackson modules (e.g., for Scala types, Kotlin data classes, or org-specific serialization). Currently, users must resort to reflection to modify the private mapper field.

issues.title: Include local activity input into its marker decision
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to include local activity input data into the marker decision/event in the history for better troubleshooting, with configurable option through LocalActivityOptions to manage history size.

issues.title: Intermittent testWorkflowMetrics Unit test failure
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Intermittent test failure in testWorkflowMetrics when running in constrained CI/CD environments. The test asserts a timing constraint (3.39s) that fails sporadically under resource constraints.

issues.title: Health check between service + temporal servers
issues.author: AngerM-DD
issues.summary: Request for a health check mechanism to verify worker/factory connection health to Temporal servers. Users need a way to check connection status (e.g., `factory.isHealthy()`) for Kubernetes health check endpoints and automatic service restart on connection loss.

issues.title: NPE on null input when calling continue as new
issues.author: mfateev
