issues.summary: NullPointerException occurs when calling continueAsNew on a workflow method without arguments. The SDK fails to handle null input when creating ContinueAsNewWorkflowExecutionDecisionAttributes.

issues.title: Do not retry SimulatedTimeoutException
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: SimulatedTimeoutException of ScheduleToStart type should not be retried according to the retry policy. The test demonstrates this exception is being incorrectly retried, violating expected timeout behavior.

issues.title: Add binary checksum to WorkerOptions
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to add binary checksum support to WorkerOptions in the Java SDK, allowing developers to mark bad builds similar to functionality in other SDKs.

issues.title: Customer needs to specify timeout for start workflow call
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Users need the ability to specify a timeout for workflow start calls in Java SDK. Currently, there's no way to set a deterministic deadline (like Go's context deadline), causing issues when fallback workflows need guaranteed success/failure timing.

issues.title: Support passing activityId to an activity invocation
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Users cannot specify a business-level activity ID during activity invocation, which prevents asynchronous activity completion by ID. The feature request asks for a way to pass activityId through ActivityOptions similar to other SDKs.

issues.title: TestWorkflowService: Make tokens unique across retries
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: TestWorkflowService generates task tokens that only include workflow and activity IDs, making them non-unique across retries. The real service generates unique tokens per retry, causing the test service to incorrectly allow a previous activity retry to complete a subsequent retry.

issues.title: Workflow versioning marker not respected on replay
issues.author: chris-rcn
issues.summary: Workflow.getVersion() markers are not being respected during replay when new version markers are added before existing ones in a V2 implementation. Previously recorded version markers return -1 instead of reusing their recorded values, despite the DecisionsHelper logic that should preserve them.

issues.title: Log activity failures
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity failures are not logged, making it difficult to debug during unit tests with automatic activity retries. Logging was added to improve visibility into activity execution failures.

issues.title: Provide shaded release JAR
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: User requests a shaded release JAR with all dependencies bundled under an internal namespace to prevent version conflicts with other libraries (particularly netty and guava) when Temporal activities make external calls.

issues.title: Delay workflow completion until abandoned workflows start
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Parent workflows may exit before child workflows start when using abandon parent policy, leaving children permanently unstarted. The proposal is to delay workflow completion until child workflows with abandon parent policy have successfully started.

issues.title: Add support for MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize for async activities
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize limit is not respected when using asynchronous activity completion. A new API for same-process async completion is needed to properly enforce the concurrency limits.

issues.title: Fix incorrect use of System.nanoTime
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: System.nanoTime() is incorrectly used for obtaining wall clock time measurements. Since nanoTime() has no correlation with actual wall clock time, the implementation should instead use currentTimeMillis() multiplied by 1,000,000 to get nanoseconds.

issues.title: Automatically reconnect to the service when it changes ip address
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Worker and client need automatic reconnection when service IP address changes, particularly in Kubernetes deployment scenarios. Currently requires a full restart to handle IP changes behind DNS records.

issues.title: Support @SignalMethod and @QueryMethod in independent interfaces
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to support @SignalMethod and @QueryMethod in independent interfaces separate from the main workflow interface, enabling registration and invocation of signal/query handlers as standalone components that can be reused across multiple workflows.

issues.title: Require explicit annotation for Workflow and Activity interfaces.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Issue requesting explicit @ActivityInterface and @WorkflowInterface annotations to disambiguate which interfaces define activity types, solving problems with Spring proxies and multiple activity implementations sharing the same interface.

issues.title: Add workflow deadlock detector
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow code that mistakenly uses Java synchronization primitives (e.g., synchronized methods) causes deadlocks since the dispatcher relies on cooperative multithreading. This feature proposes implementing a deadlock detector that fails the decision task with a clear error message when such blocking primitives are detected.

issues.title: Add support for ActivityOptions.WaitForCancellation
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: ActivityOptions lacks support for WaitForCancellation, leaving no way to wait for activity cancellation when it occurs. Activities are currently abandoned on cancellation without a way to handle cleanup or wait for completion.

issues.title: Fix getVersion
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: getVersion() returns different values for the same changeID when unversioned workflows resume with versioned code. Java client records a MarkerRecorded event while the Go client does not.

issues.title: Change Activity.getTask to Activity.getInfo
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Replace Activity.getTask() which exposes low-level protobuf with Activity.getInfo() for a simpler API. Also add Activity.getTimeUntilTimeout() method to help activities know when they will timeout.

issues.title: Add support for cross domain activity and child workflow scheduling
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add support for scheduling activities and child workflows across different domains/namespaces. This feature is currently not supported by the Temporal server.

issues.title: Rename Worker.register... to Worker.set
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Worker registration methods (registerActivitiesImpl and registerWorkflowImplementationTypes) use confusing naming conventions. These methods fully override the list rather than accumulating, which contradicts their names - they should be renamed to 'set' methods to accurately reflect their behavior.

issues.title: Expose RPC timeout to the client code
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The Java SDK's Worker and WorkflowClient classes do not expose RPC timeout configuration, defaulting to 1 second which is insufficient for some use cases. Customer requests the ability to set RPC timeout from client code.

issues.title: Add Logger that works in both activity and workflow context
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow.getLogger() throws an exception when called outside of workflow context. Proposal is to make getLogger() gracefully fall back to a standard logger instead of ReplayAwareLogger when invoked outside workflow context.

issues.title: Fix CancellationException stack trace
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: When an activity is cancelled, the CancellationException's stack trace points to the internal handleActivityTaskCanceled method instead of the actual caller of the activity, making debugging difficult.

issues.title: Simplify async activity implementation
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to simplify async activity implementation by supporting CompletableFuture-returning methods without tying up threads. Proposes ActivityAsync adapter class and dynamic proxy pattern for converting async implementations to standard activity interfaces.

issues.title: Remove InterruptedException from WorkflowQueue
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Remove InterruptedException from WorkflowQueue to ensure workflow code uses CancellationScope for cancellation instead of throwing InterruptedException, which should never occur in workflow code.

issues.title: Spring Boot Integration
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Epic tracking Spring Boot integration for the Java SDK. Includes core integration tasks and related bugs/improvements to be addressed.

issues.title: Migrate Java Client from Thrift/TChannel to gRPC
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Migrate the Java Client from Thrift/TChannel to gRPC for improved performance and compatibility with the Temporal server.

issues.title: Implement temporal gRPC code generation
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add gRPC code generation for Java SDK by integrating temporal-proto repository and implementing Gradle build rules to generate Java bindings from protobuf definitions.

issues.title: Enable Buildkite for Java Client
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Enable automated testing infrastructure for Java Client using Buildkite CI/CD platform. This involves setting up Buildkite to automatically test all pull requests.

issues.title: Move code from com.uber.cadence to io.temporal packages
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Move Java SDK codebase from com.uber.cadence packages to io.temporal packages to align with Temporal branding and namespace.

issues.title: Refactor ReplayWorkflowContext out of WorkflowThread
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Refactor hardcoded MDC initialization and replay context logic from WorkflowThreadImpl into a generic interceptor pattern. Currently, WorkflowThread has hardcoded dependencies that should be moved to interceptors to improve extensibility and separation of concerns.

issues.title: Switch to Jackson for default DataConverter
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Replace the default DataConverter implementation with Jackson for better maintenance and Java 11 support.
